programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: Rules Of Dating
programme.desc: A cynical woman joins a school as a student teacher. When her supervising teacher makes advances on her, a battle of will and wits begins as they are both unsure of themselves and each other.

programme.title: Wide Awake
programme.desc: A young boy traumatized after experiencing anesthesia awareness during his heart surgery winds up on a killing spree 25 years later.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Where The Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Blood And Ties
programme.desc: A journalist suspects that her doting father may have been the culprit in a child abduction case 15 years ago, which the statute of limitations is set to expire soon.

programme.title: Innocent Thing
programme.desc: A high school student develops a crush on her popular gym teacher that soon spirals out of control when she becomes dangerously obsessed.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Soo-In was falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life in prison. He escaped from prison with the help of inmate Sang-Byung, eventually met and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: Suspicion leads to hysteria when rural villagers link a series of brutal murders to the arrival of a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: Diva
programme.desc: A diving diva submerges into an unknown depth of fear after getting into a terrible car accident with her best friend.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung who lost confidence to her appearance met her old schoolmate, who has transformed into a beautiful woman through training in the yoga academy. She joined the academy along with 4 other women, and strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Some
programme.desc: When close to $10 million of illegal drugs is stolen from the police, a rookie cop teams up with a female reporter to investigate drug trafficking and police corruption.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins "equally worse" fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Mr. Housewife
programme.desc: A dad enjoys his daily chores and taking care of his daughter at home. But when he faces financial trouble, he joins a TV game show to win the jackpot while pretending to be a housewife.

programme.title: Too Hot To Die
programme.desc: Three men who’ve made a pact to commit suicide plan their last night out but things change when a beautiful woman appears in front of them.

programme.title: Shades Of The Heart
programme.desc: Novelist who just get divorced wish to write a novel based on his life. In the process, he met people with stories about the past, memory and death. These encounters caused a change in his thoughts...

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Modern Boy
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese rule, a Korean civil servant with an extravagant lifestyle falls in love with a bar singer who turns out to be a member of the Korean independence movement.

programme.title: Blood And Ties

programme.title: Anarchist From Colony
programme.desc: The true story a Korean patriot Park Yeol, who formed the anarchist organization "Black Wave" during the Japanese colonial period and attempted the assassination of the Japanese Crown Prince Hirohito.

programme.title: A Moment To Remember
programme.desc: A love story about a young couple's enduring love, which is tested when the 27 year old Sun-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: Suspicion leads to hysteria when rural villagers link a series of brutal murders to the arrival of a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: Warriors Of The Dawn
programme.desc: To avoid invading Japanese forces, King Seonjo escapes to the Ming Empire. In his place, Prince Gwanghae leads the royal court and confronts the enemies with the help of proxy soldiers led by To-woo.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was given a task to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster talented in singing and dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Confession Of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book "I am the Murderer\.

programme.title: Radio Dayz
programme.desc: During the Japanese imperialistic regime in 1933, a team of misfits come together to make Joseon's first live radio drama.

programme.title: My Boss, My Teacher
programme.desc: Doo-sik is now a senior in college, studying to be a teacher by day and working in a gang by night. But trouble finds him when his boss wants him to work for him during the day.

programme.title: The Devil Judge
programme.desc: Set in dystopian Korea where the entire nation participates in live court trials, is the notorious “Devil Judge” Kang Yohan a hero or a devil wearing the mask of the law?

programme.title: My Roommate is a Gumiho
programme.desc: A fantasy romance between Shin Woo-yeo, a 999-year-old nine-tailed fox and Lee Dam, a college student who swallowed the fox’s pearl. Without it, Shin will not be able to attain the human form...

programme.title: Ghost Fever
programme.desc: A married businessman's ill-advised dalliance with a mysterious beauty comes back to haunt him--literally--when it turns out his bedmate is one of a family of ghosts, who visit revenge upon his family and possess him. Unusually grim material for screenwriter/star Wong Jing.

programme.title: Crime Story
programme.desc: Inspector Eddie Chan is a brilliant, but emotionally troubled cop assigned to protect a real-estate mogul who's been threatened with kidnapping. Unfortunately, despite Eddie's best efforts, he's unable to prevent the abduction. His emotions nearing a breaking point, Eddie is paired with fellow cop Hung to track the kidnappers to Taiwan, but circumstances seem to be working against them.

programme.title: Master Q 2001
programme.desc: Comic book characters Master Q and Potato meet Nicholas Tse and Ceclia Cheung in a dazzling mixture of animation and live action.

programme.title: Dream Lovers
programme.desc: Chow Yun-fat and Brigitte Lin discover they were lovers two millennium ago in this romance about the mysteries of reincarnation.

programme.title: Lucky Stars Go Places
programme.desc: The lucky stars reunite again. Having the new members joined in, they are playful and frolicsome as usual. This time, their mission is to investigate a case of international ammunition trade that involves two gangs.

programme.title: Zodiac Killers
programme.desc: Three young Chinese - Ben, Ming and Chuck - come to Japan for study and adventure. Ming wants to make it fast. So he marries Yuriko, sister of underworld godfather Ishikawa.

programme.title: The Happy Ghost
programme.desc: A group of girls go on a camping trip and take shelter from the rain in an abandoned temple. One of them, Bonnie, takes a rope she found in the temple back with her not knowing that in the rope lies the soul of a fallen scholar from the Ching Dynasty. The ghost, Bindeye Pik, tries to help them with some of their daily trials and tribulations but then unwittingly gets them into trouble.

programme.title: What A Small World
programme.desc: Unhappy couple Rosamund Kwan and Lawrence Ng go separately to Paris and London and rekindle friendships with Ray Lui and Nina Li.

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story II
programme.desc: Following the events of A Chinese Ghost Story, Ling Choi Sin returns to his hometown and, while fleeing from cannibals, gets himself imprisoned. With the help of his cell mate, scholar Elder Chu, Sin escapes and then finds himself crossing paths with rebel sisters Moon and Windy, who bears a strong resemblance to his beloved tragic ghost, Lip Siu Sin.

programme.title: Chase A Fortune
programme.desc: Script written by Wong Kar Wai. Sport reporter Xiang is hurted by the King Boxer while trying to interview him. As advice by his cousin, Xiang pretends to be handicap in order to get compensation from insurance company.

programme.title: My Date with a Vampire S1
programme.desc: While in combat during the Second Sino-Japanese War, Major Yamamoto Kazuo and Fong Kwok-Wah gets bitten by Cheung San, a first generation vampire, thereafter sealing both their fates for eternity.

programme.title: Spiritual Love
programme.desc: Pok (Chow Yun Fat), tough in appearance but tender in heart. He lives with his cousin Cheisea who is into all things bizarre and cultish. Pok then chances upon a letter from Butterfly (Cherie Chung) who complains about her misfortunes. Pok fall in love with Butterfly, however, fall in love with ghost will only brings out sad memories.

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: The story of Wai Siu Bo, a lecherous wimp who after saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, a revolutionary group, is made a member. After a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow. What follows is plenty of mayhem and laughter. But it ends with the exposure and escape of the fake Empress Dowager.

programme.title: Till Death Do we Scare
programme.desc: The ghosts of the deceased husbands of three-time widow Olivia Cheng try to break the curse by fixing her up with Alan Tam.

programme.title: Police Story II
programme.desc: Due to detective Chan Ka Kui unorthodox police work on the last case, Chan has been demoted to traffic duty…and the vengeful mobsters still have their sights on taking him down. But when terrorists threaten Hong Kong, Chan must track down the suspects. And when his girlfriend May is kidnapped by the terrorists, Chan must confront them, save his girlfriend and save the day as only Jackie Chan can.

programme.title: Lucky Diamond
programme.desc: Anita Mui reluctantly shares office space with private eye Alex in a comedy of gangsters, insurance fraud, and diamonds.

programme.title: Moon Stars & Sun
programme.desc: Maggie Cheung is Chu, a young lady forced by her abusive father to sell her virginity. Far more experienced are Gigi (Cherie Chung), a lady who does what she must to spring her convict husband from prison, and Porsche (Dodo Cheng), an ageing call girl wise in the ways of the demimonde but still clinging to the hope of finding true love. Dodo Cheng won the Best Actress Award at Golden Horse for this movie.

programme.title: The Ghost Snatchers
programme.desc: A big party is going on in a newly built skyscraper. Under their very nose, sultry Judy is snatched by ghosts. She is recruited by the ghost king to lure target people into death. Chee comes to the building as a guard since his uncle Fang is the chief of the guards. Chee sees Judy in trapping people with the help of ghosts. Chee's girlfriend leads Fang and Chee to consult a lady exorcist who finds out that the ghost king is determined to kill all people having a negative horoscope...

programme.title: The Attractive One
programme.desc: Sean Lau plays a barbeque restaurant owner who falls in love with Joey Yung, a beauty thearpist in a pet beauty shop. As fate would have it, Joey has a crush on someone else. Can a 30 odd year old who has never experienced love win the love of his love? Or is his efforts doomed to failure?

programme.title: Fruit Punch
programme.desc: Hacken and his friends run their business but fail repeatedly. Even with a rich man's support, the business and his romance are sill at stake.

programme.title: Eastern Condors
programme.desc: Lam is an American army officer given a top secret mission by the US military. The mission entails entering Vietnam to destroy an old American bunker filled with missiles before the Viet Cong can get to them. Due to the dangerous nature of the mission, a group of Chinese American soldier convicts are selected to accompany him, led by Tung Ming-sun. Survivors are promised a pardon, U.S. citizenship and $200,000 each. After a brief training session they are dropped into Vietnam...

programme.title: The Intellectual Trio
programme.desc: Wong Kar-wai co-scripted this comedy about cops Leslie Cheung and Billy Lau who encounter pickpockets Sandy Lam and Joyce Ngai.

programme.title: City on Fire
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewelry store.

programme.title: 100 Ways To Murder Your Wife
programme.desc: Two men plot to kill their beautiful but nagging and unbearable wives.

programme.title: A Bite of Love
programme.desc: Duke Lee is a world-weary vampire who's given up on attacking human beings, and concerns himself with finding alternatives to his former blood-sucking exploits. He meets Anna, a triad boss' daughter who seeks out Duke Lee to use his blood as a potential life-saving elixir for her father. The plan to save his life will work, but it will also turn him into a vampire, and not necessarily a responsible one like Duke Lee!

programme.title: My Date with a Vampire S1
programme.desc: Yau comes across a female ghost, Jan and Ling in a spring hotel. Jan is gradually fond of Yau. While the plan by Ling and Yau to take out the ghost is going on like a wildfire, Peacock joins in the exorcism.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: In World War II Shanghai, Tony Leung is torn between his duty to China and his love for nightclub singer Anita Mui.

programme.title: Dream of Desire
programme.desc: Dream of Desire revolves around the complicated love affairs between two guys and three girls.

programme.title: Sentenced To Hang
programme.desc: A powerful drama based on the infamous Three Wolves Case of 1963 with Tony Leung the youngest member of a murderous trio.

programme.title: Mr Smart
programme.desc: Mr Smart, actually a silly fat guy, opens a fast-food shop at Wong's suggestion. The business goes up and down, just like the lady he is courting.

programme.title: City Hunter
programme.desc: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

programme.title: Couples, Couples, Couples
programme.desc: Office executive Cherie Chung wants to have children with her live-in lover, photographer Jacky Cheung, but he has other ideas.

programme.title: Sunshine Friends
programme.desc: In order to save father's television station,Elizabeth asks 4 funny witty guys for help. But the situation gets worse under their guide.

programme.title: A True Mob Story (1998)
programme.desc: Triad member Cheung Dee (Andy Lau) earns his living as a parking attendant. Fending off an ambush by a rival gang leader, Cheung Dee blinds the leader of the rivaling gang Crazy Ball.

programme.title: Last Ghost Standing
programme.desc: On New Years Eve 2000 the cinema on the 666 King's Road presents its last show before closure. A horrible, gory bloodbath starts out, including a soccer match with a decapitated head and a nasty faeces monster.

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts II
programme.desc: Police Academy meets Private Benjamin when the all-girl Banshees competes with the all-boy Flying Tigers to nab a criminal gang.

programme.title: Three Against the World
programme.desc: Detective Andy Lau must protect a priceless Koran against the schemes of gunman Norman Tsui Siu-keung and thief Teddy Robin.

programme.title: Front Page
programme.desc: Hui, an owner of a Hong Kong tabloid magazine company hires martial artist Bill Lee (Sam Hui) to help him get a good headliner for a magazine story to, hopefully, save his failing business.

programme.title: Needing You
programme.desc: Andy is a womanizing sales manager at an HK electronics firm, who finds his life embroiled in office politics and gossip when he gets involved in the life of Kinki, a kooky office lady who's emotionally daffy but genuinely delightful. Kinki is an odd, but pure-hearted girl whose weird ways initially annoy Andy. But her genuine personality and work ethic win him over, until Andy's ex-girlfriend Fiona shows up looking to rekindle their romance….

programme.title: Aces Go Places II
programme.desc: The orders come from Henry Kissinger, and the assassin is the nefarious Black Glove, who happens to look just like Clint Eastwood AND wears his costume from his famous Spaghetti Westerns, too! Unfazed by their new popularity, King Kong and Kodojak continue to pal around, find romantic misadventures, annoy the returning Inspector "Hot Tongue" Ho, get framed for various crimes, and still regroup in time to rout the bad guys and save the day.

programme.title: Pom Pom
programme.desc: Ah Chau and Beethoven are a pair of cops investigating a drug lord, but their ineptitude threatens to derail the case. The police are well aware that Mr Sha is the boss of the crime syndicate smuggling and trafficking in drugs, and that he keeps details of his criminal transactions in a book which is kept by his mistress. When Beethoven and Ah Chau investigate, they find Sha's mistress dead.

programme.title: Farewell China
programme.desc: Set primarily in New York City, the film follows Zhou who follows his wife's journey to America - and the tough surprises in store for him in the "Promised Land.".

programme.title: Bullet in the Head
programme.desc: John Woo classic set in Saigon and Hong Kong in 1967, an epic test of love and loyalty between Tony Leung and Jacky Cheung.

programme.title: Fist Power
programme.desc: A loss of custody of the child's father, as eager son, hope the police attention caused by terrorist actions, and then retrieve their children.

programme.title: The Owl VS Bumbo
programme.desc: Bumbo and Owl are partners in crime and they scam some triad big shot out of a load of money and decide to retire. Three years later they both receive letters from Stanley Fung, in which he informs them that he has proof of all their criminal activity and unless they do exactly what he says–he will turn it over to the cops. Fung is an ex-cop himself and is trying to get the goods on the same triad leader that Sammo and George scammed.

programme.title: Headlines
programme.desc: Daniel Wu, Emil Chow, and Maggie Cheung Ho-yee play competitive news reporters whose professional and personal lives intersect.

programme.title: The Loser's Club
programme.desc: Offbeat comedy about third-rate producer Eric Tsang and third-rate singer Francis Ng who team up to claw their way to the top.

programme.title: The Legend of Speed
programme.desc: Sky is a rebellious street racer whose cocky demeanor and sometimes brash behavior make him a prime candidate for a fall. He receives his comeuppance when a race against ex-con Fung results in tragic consequences. Exiled to Thailand, Sky meets his wayward father, who helps Sky reconnect to the philosophical side of his racing talent. Reinvigorated and wiser, Sky plans to return to Hong Kong for a rematch with Fung….

programme.title: Inspector Pink Dragon
programme.desc: Nerdy Inspector Lawrence Cheng becomes the object of a scam involving heartthrob Rosamund Kwan and tycoon gangster Damian Lau.

programme.title: Carry On Pickpocket
programme.desc: Pickpocket Sammo Hung falls for policewoman Deanie Yip and is convinced to steal for her. But Deanie is not what she seems to be.

programme.title: Profiles Of Pleasure
programme.desc: In 1930s Hong Kong, Officer Adam tries to enforce a ban on prostitution but falls for Rosamund Kwan and Carina Lau instead.

programme.title: My Troublesome Buddy
programme.desc: Patrick Tam plays a successful but nasty salesman who finds there's more to life than money-grubbing and backstabbing when a potentially fatal car accident brings him face to face with his conscience.

programme.title: Fractured Follies
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat is Joe, an aimless taxi driver who hits May (Joey Wong), a sweet girl who’s afflicted with a rare problem. It seems one of her legs is one inch longer than the other. In sympathy, Joe decides to help May's family and their new grocery store, which is a run-down work-in-progress. Love blooms along the way, a plot development that’s helped by the always good chemistry between Chow Yun-Fat and Joey Wong.

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story III
programme.desc: Buddhist Bai Yun and his disciple Fong journey through a small town to transport a golden idol of Buddha. However, local thieves thwart their journey, sending them to take shelter at the ghostly Orchid Temple. There, Fong encounters Lotus, a female ghost at the evil bidding of the awakened Tree Devil.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: It is 859AD, and the Tang Dynasty, one of the most enlightened empires in Chinese history at its height, is in decline. The Emperor is incompetent and the government is corrupt. Unrest is spreading.

programme.title: Lokah Laqi
programme.desc: In a secluded indigenous tribe, 3 kids grew up in the mountains and the woods. They are all very optimistic, yet, they are also troubled by their own family issues. Their handicapped teacher opened an after school session to help them with their schoolwork. The teacher has a beautiful voice, but never sings. One day, the 3 kids find a tape of their teacher's recording and are amazed by her voice. They decide to bring this tape to Taipei....

programme.title: 2 Idiots
programme.desc: Accidently hired by a private investigation firm, two young men are sent on a mission of collecting debt. When they finally get a 10-million-dollar check from the director of an orphanage, they find that they don't feel happy at all. A battle between their real personalities and the harsh reality begins...

programme.title: Team of Miracle: We Will Rock You
programme.desc: "Lantern Street" is a place for the forgotten. As night falls, street lights shine on a homeless population that calls the sidewalks home. But they're not forgotten by everyone. Inspired at a young age by a priest, social worker Tung has dedicated his life to helping the homeless. To raise the spirits of his charges, he decides to organize a soccer team for the homeless. Can this ragtag team makes it to the first ever Homeless World Cup?

programme.title: Keep Calm and be a Superstar
programme.desc: ZHU from China, as a huge fan of Hong Kong cinema, has always dream of become a cop like in the movies, who unfortunately failed the fitness exam in China's Police Force selection because of asthma.

programme.title: The Wasted Times
programme.desc: Over the course of several decades, a deal between the Japanese army and criminals in Shanghai plays out with violence and betrayal.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Investigator William Luk and JFIU Chief Inspector Lau Po-keung both hit a dead end in their investigation of a bribery and a money laundering case.

programme.title: Silent Code
programme.desc: Reporter Lan thinks that she can uses her talent in her company. But she is told to look for news on the forums of the Internet. She visits a large forum named BBS. She watches as the forum's members attack the owner of the Dream Board, Xiang. There are some signs that the mastermind behind these attacks is actually Xiang's ex-boyfriend, King. Xiang collapses.

programme.title: Walk with Me
programme.desc: Sam grew up with her parents in a cold relationship. She lived in a sublet with her gambling father and nurse mother. But Sam began to feel that there was a little girl with her in the house and everywhere she went.

programme.title: Agent Mr. Chan
programme.desc: A disgraced agent is forced to come back for one last undercover assignment.

programme.title: Deep Evil
programme.desc: Han. As the duo search for clues to identify the headless victim, they find it all pointing to a top plastic surgeon Kao who seems to have a complex history with Han in the past.

programme.title: Front Page
programme.desc: Hui, an owner of a Hong Kong tabloid magazine company hires martial artist Bill Lee (Sam Hui) to help him get a good headliner for a magazine story to, hopefully, save his failing business.

programme.title: Hill of Ilha Verde
programme.desc: Since the handover to China, “Las Vegas of the Orient”, Macau has become the number one gambling city in the world. At the night of this endless city, a 14 year-old girl Hio leaves home taking a journey alone to search for her mum. Wandering between the dream and the reality, she visits her family members scattered in different parts of the city. The forgotten secret of the family is gradually revealed.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: In a wedding banquet, a son of the Chief Commander was attracted by the beautiful bride. He attempted to rape her but failed. Chau Wah-sing, a muddleheaded minor government official, wanted to prove her innocence.

programme.title: Partners in Crime
programme.desc: Huang Li Huai is an unassuming loner. Ye Yi Kai is an athletic rebel. Lin Yong Qun is a popular model student. These three boys had nothing in common until the day they witnessed fellow student Xia Wei Qiao fall to her death. In order to investigate the circumstances behind her death, the three strangers come together in secret and eventually conclude that Wei Qiao ended her own life after being bullied by another student.

programme.title: Hooked on You
programme.desc: Miu runs one of the fish stalls at the Fortune Market along with her gambling addict father. A feud with rival vendor Fishman will turn into friendship plus feelings of more as they two move through history between 1997 to 2007...

programme.title: 23:59 The Haunting Hour
programme.desc: Recruit Tommy is bullied by his army mates. He seeks comfort from the compliments left by his readers on his blog that features fictitious army horror stories he writes. One day, things starts to go awry.

programme.title: Scent
programme.desc: “Scent” is about romantic love in cities. It is directed by the Hong Kong Film Awards Best New Director Award winner Tsang Tsui Shan. In the movie, the Korean male lead, Park Si Hoo, becomes the male servant and bares his upper torso in a passionate scene. Park Shi Hoo plays Kang In Joon, a Korean interior designer...who finds love when he meets an innocent Chinese girl...

programme.title: Never Gone
programme.desc: The appearance of a gentle and quiet Su Yun Jin high school students at Cheng Zheng soulful pursuit slowly fell in love with each other, can be easy to get along helplessly in love, living environment as well as differences in childhood character started to become two different issues between, and constantly found contradictions eventually let the feelings of a rift last reached the break position….

programme.title: Strawberry Cliff
programme.desc: A women with a rare gift to tell the future events goes on an unexpected journey to find truth about life, death, and most important of all, love.

programme.title: Magic to Win
programme.desc: By accident, his power is transmitted to his student, Macy, bringing an enchanting and meaningful adventure to this ordinary girl.

programme.title: Let's Eat
programme.desc: Dai Hung is the laidback chef of Ah Yong Cafe, a traditional one-star restaurant known for Hainanese chicken rice. Everything changes when the owner's daughter Rosemary returns from abroad to take over management, bringing with her newfangled marketing ideas and cost-saving measures that put her at odds with Dai Hung. Ah Yong Cafe's business hits rock bottom when they get slapped with an extremely negative review by a famous food critic.

programme.title: Full Strike
programme.desc: New action comedy "Full Strike" is a fantasy story about how a person struggles for a victory in badminton, a rare theme for movies. NG Kau Sau was once Queen in badminton; she gave up herself after expelled from the sport. Ng's passion is reignited when she runs into a trio of former armed robbers who spend their post-prison lives practicing badminton with an always drunken coach. Meanwhile, a wacky adversary provides extra incentives.

programme.title: A Fool in Love, Love Like a Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favorite author Kauff. One day, he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's "normal life," has become not "normal.".

programme.title: Kick Ass Girls
programme.desc: Friends and owners of a boxing gym, Bo, Miu and TT face different problems in life, friendships and love as they approach their thirties. Drawn by a lucrative prize, the three of them embark on an adventure in Malaysia where they fall into the trap set by a mysterious woman Zhuge. What seems to be a simple and exciting journey turns into an unimaginable human trafficking scheme that pulls Bo, Miu and TT into an underground MMA world.

programme.title: Prison on Fire
programme.desc: The plot mostly involves the two main characters, Ching and Yiu and problems they face with Mickey, a fellow inmate and "Scarface\.

programme.title: Hands in the Hair
programme.desc: Once a Shanghai beauty with hordes of men chasing after her, Aini (Rosamund Kwan) is now just an ordinary woman married to a boring husband (Francis Ng). Her wealth, like her beauty, has faded away whereas people around her have become richer and richer.

programme.title: White Lies, Black Lies
programme.desc: The film is inspired by a sensational real-life 1960s murder case. The wife of Rainbow Salon owner Su is found with her throat slit. Suspicion points to Su who goes on the run with his first love. Their former classmate Mei Yu, a journalist, offers to tell their side of the story in exclusive, but it soon transpires that this mystery may be related to another case in their past.

programme.title: The Big Day
programme.desc: When Su Yu, a free-spirited personal trainer and diving instructor, says “Yes” to Nuo Yan, a modern funeral director, she imagines a simple, peaceful wedding. But the reality is just the opposite!

programme.title: Super Express
programme.desc: A modest super-express delivery courier gets entangled in a spiral of adventure and romance in Shanghaï. the robbery of a cat statue relic exhibited at a museum in Marseille, France.

programme.title: The Golden Era
programme.desc: The life story of Xiao Hong, one of China's most famous essayists and novelists, who reflected the progressive thinking not frequently seen during the 1930s.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Fatt and Tin Ba are both former students of legendary mahjong master Ru, but their lives couldn't have turned out more differently. Fatt is a stuffed tofu vendor operating out of a dilapidated coffee shop. Tin Ba is a ten-time mahjong world champion and has all the wealth and glory that come with that title. One day, Tin Ba drops by Fatt's coffee shop and throws down the gauntlet, challenging his erstwhile friend to a mahjong battle...

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: William Luk, goes undercover as a prisoner to investigate correctional officers who are receiving bribes.

programme.title: Memory Eclipse
programme.desc: On the night of a super moon, radio host Veena receives a call from her mother who had committed suicide a few weeks ago. She begins to investigate the cause of her mother's depression that year and found out that even though her mother loved someone else, she married Veena’s father for Veena’s own sake. With the super moon due to appear three times, Veena is determined to change the past and alter her mother’s fate but her actions are not without consequences...

programme.title: A Moment of Happiness
programme.desc: Zhen wants to be internet famous, so she works with friends to create a pretty rich girl version of herself online. One day, she meets and falls in love with Nat, a Thai tourist. In reality, Nat is from a rich family, but the real Zhen is from an average family only….

programme.title: Master Z: The Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: While keeping a low profile after his defeat from Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi gets into trouble after getting in a fight with a powerful foreigner.

programme.title: The Leakers
programme.desc: After mutated Zika epidemic happens in Malaysia, illegal hacker group 'The Leakers' network with Hong Kong police David tries to disclose pharmaceutical company AMANAH Malaysia's conspiracy and crimes.

programme.title: Mr. Unbelievable
programme.desc: Eric Kwek Hock Seng, born on the same day as Singapore (August 9, 1965), is abandoned as a baby in a basket with a broccoli, and is taken in by Master Lo Man. Lo Man trains Eric to perform in the getai industry, although his looks has caused setbacks. Through the years, he becomes one who is a patriotic Singaporean...

programme.title: The Bride
programme.desc: Han and Hao are about to get married soon when Hao picks up a strange red envelope on the street and then all hell breaks loose with a vengeful supernatural bride wreaking havoc on his life.

programme.title: When Geek Meets Serial Killer
programme.desc: Zhang Jian-He, a reserved and rather introverted cartoonist, is dating a beaituful and conservative girlfriend, YaShi. One day, in an unfortunate dispute with his best buddy Chen-Jun, is accidently killed by Zhang Jian-He.

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: It talks about four relationships. A couple breaking up yet holding tight; a father and a daughter meeting up after a long separation; a girl escaping from growing up; and two buddies’ reunion after years of misunderstanding. Different people carry different stories. The stories are connected by a vintage photography studio. Their experiences bring out a variety of sensations to the city we are living in; these feelings belong to them.

programme.title: Goodbye Darling
programme.desc: Tai (Raymond Wong), a loving and caring husband and Josephine (Cherrie Chung), his sweet and darling wife, are a young, merry couple. Tai has a close lawyer friend, funny but kind-hearted Choi Sum (John Sum) who often offers his help whenever Tai needs it. Tai works in a De Luxe hotel's top management. He brings his wife to the hotel's annual ball in which all his colleagues are fascinated by the beauty of Josephine. Among the colleagues, there is a notorious seducer who is execptionally keen in seducing the wives of his friends. Tai, with the help of Choi Sum, makes every effort to protect his wife. They bring themselves into a series of hilarious and comic situations. Due to a complicated misunderstanding, Tai learns that he has got an incurabl cancer...

programme.title: The Fantastic Water Babes
programme.desc: Gil is a vengeful girl who's just lost her boyfriend. Out of reckless anger, she joins the Fantastic Water Babes swimming competition against her romantic rival and her friends, even though she doesn't know how to swim. When celebrity swimmer Yuen doesn't follow through on his public promise to help her, Gil kidnaps him to Cheung Chau to make him teach her and her friends how to swim.

programme.title: Undercover Punch and Gun
programme.desc: Undercover police Wu teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a major drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: Wayang Boy
programme.desc: The classic fish-out-of-water story is revitalized by a dose of Chinese opera in the distinctly Singapore-flavored family comedy Wayang Boy! The film follows 10-year-old Raja, an Indian boy who's recently been brought to Singapore by his stepmother Emma. After Raja gets into a scuffle with his new classmates Xavier and Shi Han, all three boys end up in detention.

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: A male UFC boxer switches bodies with the female reporter who exposed his bribes. Now they must help each other win the championship.

programme.title: A Dream Team
programme.desc: Sammy's Hui Man Keung believes in fate and feng shui. When he was born, a fortune teller prophesied that he'd meet his cruel end by the time he's 30 years old. Now on the brink of that fatal age, he feels even more downhearted….

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: At the end of the 1950's, finally settled into a stable life, during his daily trip to take his young son to and from school, Ip Man meets another father Cheung Tin Chi; it happens that Cheung is a fellow Wing Chun practitioner. Suddenly, gangsters led by Sang try to take over properties in the neighborhood and Ip Man decides to lead his students to guard the neighborhood!

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2020
programme.desc: The Yau brothers team up with fellow con artists the Lui sisters to scam an infamous mob boss.

programme.title: More Than Blue
programme.desc: Sharing similar circumstances, the two become best friends and share a home. Diagnosed with terminal illness, K never confesses his love for Cream. He wants her to settle down before his time runs out.

programme.title: Line Walker 2
programme.desc: After they uncover evidence that there is corruption in the police force, three police officers in Hong Kong try to discover which of them can be trusted.

programme.title: Taxi Taxi
programme.desc: "Taxi! Taxi!" is a social comedy set in the metropolitan city-state of Singapore, told through the encounters of two characters who are in what is widely perceived as the most sociable profession on the island taxi drivers.

programme.title: My Missing Valentine
programme.desc: Hsiao-chi is a young woman who always rushes and gets things done quickly. Every day, Hsiao-chi repeats the same work at the counter in the post office. Amongst all sorts of customers who Hsiao-chi has to deal with is a bus driver called Tai; Tai is as slow as a sloth and comes to Hsiao-chi in the post office to send a letter by ordinary delivery every day...

programme.title: Speak Out Loud! Yes or No?
programme.desc: This is a program made specially for Taiwan. Explore the beauty of the country with Belle Yu by investigating the difference in culture and habits of the 22 counties.

programme.title: Shuttle Love Millennium
programme.desc: In 1936, the day of fire, Xuen and Yi are busying in the studio. The studio suddenly on fire. In order to escape, Gang breaks the wall and helps Yi and Xuen leave. But Gang can not see where Yi and Xuen are.

programme.title: Stylish Man the Chef
programme.desc: Two pretty ladies are here on the show to compete for chicken. How would the chicken be like in western styles? Anyway, you have to know the rules and play it well in order to enjoy the dishes.

programme.title: Lady Commander Plus
programme.desc: Lady Commander Plus presents to you all interesting issues between men and women with upgraded content and more exciting guests including hot moms, popular talents, and relationship guru.

programme.title: Super Entourage
programme.desc: Best Host in a Variety Program” award for this talk show.

programme.title: Speak Out Loud! Yes or No?
programme.desc: This is a program made specially for Taiwan. Explore the beauty of the country with Belle Yu by investigating the difference in culture and habits of the 22 counties.

programme.title: Stylish Man the Chef
programme.desc: Two pretty ladies are here on the show to compete for chicken. How would the chicken be like in western styles? Anyway, you have to know the rules and play it well in order to enjoy the dishes.

programme.title: The Best Partner
programme.desc: After her diligent work of persuasion, Gu Jie becomes the temporary new head partner of the law firm. Bin is discontented with the handover. He decides to help on it for the sake of Yin.

programme.title: Witty Star
programme.desc: Want to find out how smart you are? Then make sure you don't miss Witty Star! The show test your knowledge in different aspects including science, history, pop culture and anything you can imagine.

programme.title: Super Entourage
programme.desc: Best Host in a Variety Program” award for this talk show.

programme.title: Lady Commander Plus
programme.desc: Lady Commander Plus presents to you all interesting issues between men and women with upgraded content and more exciting guests including hot moms, popular talents, and relationship guru.

programme.title: Witty Star
programme.desc: It seems that Master Li has encountered obstacles! The vice president is coming to cook! When I eat pineapples, there are times when I feel biting my tongue. What is the main reason?

programme.title: Stylish Man the Chef
programme.desc: Chef Kai makes his five-star debut with the deluxe grape shrimps. The food brainstorm game just push them to the limit. Surprisingly, a team master it instantly.

programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would “share life” for 105 days because of various reasons. The observation group includes G.E.M., Li Dan, Chen Jian Bin, Wei Da Xun, Zeng Ke Ni, and Yang Li.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2011) (1.5 hrs)

programme.title: Perfect Match (2019)
programme.desc: New version of “Perfect Match”, 24 female guests into the heart and observation area, male guests not to debut in the "second site" with female guests across the empty dialogue. Male and female guests through two-way choice, determine the success of the two holding hands.

programme.title: We Are In Love 2
programme.desc: We Are In Love S2is a celebrity love reality show, featuring Chen Bolin, Song Ji-hyo, Shawn Yue, Zhou Dongyu, Li Qin, Wei Daxun. 6 celebrities are paired up to show what life would be like if they were in love. Every week, each couple must complete assigned tasks, and try to understand each other better to maintain the relationship.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 2
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. The guests who are under the stage would be arranged to a room, to communicate more and deepen their understanding with each other. Love never comes late!

programme.title: iWalker-Wednesday (M)
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Taste of Life(T)
programme.desc: Ep.115, 116 - Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change…\nChin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened.\nChu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (H)
programme.desc: Ep.4151, 4152 - The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Hot Door Night(M)
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef(M)
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Show Biz (M)
programme.desc: Every second are counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: We Are Family Bravo(M)
programme.desc: "We Are Family Bravo" assembled senior reporters from the Sanlih team to dig out the stories of the new residents in Taiwan. Through the in-depth analysis of the one-hour program, the halal culture is fully deciphered. The follow-up series of reports also include the family life, food culture, artistic creativity, employment, and entrepreneurial dream-building journeys of the new residents and the new second generation in Taiwan. Let the audience see from this group of "new family members" how the world is coming in and how the new residents are fighting for the world.

programme.title: Show Biz (M)
programme.desc: Ep.565, 566 - Every second are counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World(M)
programme.desc: There is no border and distance between countries and people. From the trend of globalization, the role played by Taiwan is clearly found. The program has already traveled to Canada, the Czech Republic, Poland, Turkey, Hungary, Romania, Iceland, etc., and also see how Taiwanese are showing competitiveness in the international arena. Taiwan’s computer’s brand like ASUS and Acer are setting their sales markets in Poland. Almost all computer components in Poland are OEMs in Taiwan. In other words, the high development of the computer industry in Poland is also part of the contribution from Taiwan! “The Borderless World” won 'International News Report Award' in the 8th Excellence Journalism Awards. In this fast-changing world, vowed to bring the latest and most comprehensive coverage for the audience. In the past two years, the team has interview the people from all around the world, to see the education level in India, the realistic and materialistic in Russia, the enthusiasm of Brazil, and the preparations to introduce the South African World Cup. The program also introduces the floating house in Dutch, the use of water in Iguazu falls, as well as the low-carbon environment in the UK, and the lively life in Sweden, bringing you the most relevant International news.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) (Repeat)
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Memory Love(M)
programme.desc: Ep.6, 7 - Can one life and two hearts be saved? Qiao Jia En and her boyfriend, Wang Xiu Kai, return to Taiwan from overseas to reunite with her estranged wealthy father. But when the couple gets into a car accident, Jia En suffers a concussion and memory loss while Shu Kai becomes brain dead. Jia En’s friend, Zhao Ai Li, takes advantage of the situation and takes Jia En’s place in meeting with Jia En’s father and assumes her place in a privileged life. Meanwhile, when pastry chef Xing Shao Tian collapses at a banquet, he needs an immediate heart transplant and ends up receiving Shu Kai’s heart. When Shao Tian fatefully meets Jia En, he is drawn to her. So is Shao Tian’s half-brother, Duan Ruo Fan. Can Shao Tian help Jia En regain her memory and her rightful place in life?

programme.desc: An education yet entertaining program that introducing folk culture, and folk myths.

In this fast-changing world, vowed to bring the latest and most comprehensive coverage for the audience. In the past two years, the team has interview the people from all around the world, to see the education level in India, the realistic and materialistic in Russia, the enthusiasm of Brazil, and the preparations to introduce the South African World Cup. The program also introduces the floating house in Dutch, the use of water in Iguazu falls, as well as the low-carbon environment in the UK, and the lively life in Sweden, bringing you the most relevant International news.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) (Repeat)
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Memory Love(M)
programme.desc: Ep.6, 7 - Can one life and two hearts be saved? Qiao Jia En and her boyfriend, Wang Xiu Kai, return to Taiwan from overseas to reunite with her estranged wealthy father. But when the couple gets into a car accident, Jia En suffers a concussion and memory loss while Shu Kai becomes brain dead. Jia En’s friend, Zhao Ai Li, takes advantage of the situation and takes Jia En’s place in meeting with Jia En’s father and assumes her place in a privileged life. Meanwhile, when pastry chef Xing Shao Tian collapses at a banquet, he needs an immediate heart transplant and ends up receiving Shu Kai’s heart. When Shao Tian fatefully meets Jia En, he is drawn to her. So is Shao Tian’s half-brother, Duan Ruo Fan. Can Shao Tian help Jia En regain her memory and her rightful place in life?

programme.title: The Borderless World(M)
programme.desc: There is no border and distance between countries and people. From the trend of globalization, the role played by Taiwan is clearly found. The program has already traveled to Canada, the Czech Republic, Poland, Turkey, Hungary, Romania, Iceland, etc., and also see how Taiwanese are showing competitiveness in the international arena. Taiwan’s computer’s brand like ASUS and Acer are setting their sales markets in Poland. Almost all computer components in Poland are OEMs in Taiwan. In other words, the high development of the computer industry in Poland is also part of the contribution from Taiwan! “The Borderless World” won 'International News Report Award' in the 8th Excellence Journalism Awards. programme.title: Azhar
programme.desc: The life of Indian cricketer and former national team captain Mohammad Azharuddin.

programme.title: Dil Bole Hadippa
programme.desc: In a Punjabi village where girls don't play cricket, Veera (Rani Mukerji) puts on a turban and becomes Veer to fulfill her dreams and fall in love with Rohan (Shahid Kapoor). (2009).

programme.title: Wazir
programme.desc: A grief-stricken cop and an amputee chess Grandmaster are brought together by a peculiar twist of fate as part of a wider conspiracy that has darkened their lives. Starring Amitabh Bachchan. (2016).

programme.title: Phantom
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Saif Ali Khan as a disgraced soldier carrying out an assassination in order to to restore his honour. Based on the book Mumbai Avengers: Aftermath of the 26/11 Attacks. (2015).

programme.title: Veer- Zaara
programme.desc: Yash Chopra's epic story of love between an Indian solider Veer Pratap Singh (Shahrukh Khan) and Zaara Hayaat Khan (Preity Zinta) from Pakistan. Also starring Rani Mukerji. (2004).

programme.title: Kanchana 3
programme.desc: Raghava is a young man who easily gets scared of ghosts. When he stays in a bungalow with his family, he gets possessed by a vengeful spirit which sets a series of events in motion.

programme.title: Krrish 3
programme.desc: The story of Rohit Mehra, a scientist, and Krishna "Krrish" Mehra, his superhero son, who face an elaborate conspiracy orchestrated by the evil genius Kaal.

programme.title: Katti Batti
programme.desc: A romantic comedy that follows Maddy and Payal's live-in relationship until a sudden turn of events creates a distance between them.

programme.title: Dhoom 2
programme.desc: Jewel thief and master of disguise Mr A plots his next big heist while being pursued by two cops.

programme.title: Arjun Patiala
programme.desc: A story of two people who were born to hate, but destined to love.

programme.title: Rocket Singh
programme.desc: This is the story of a graduate, Harpreet Singh, who is struggling with the balance between the demands of the professional way and the way of his heart. Soon his world is turned upside down.

programme.title: Poster Boys
programme.desc: Life of three men comes in trouble when their photos appear on advertisement for sterilization.

programme.title: Sui Dhaaga
programme.desc: Mauji, along with his wife, Mamta, decides to start his own garment business. To make a name for himself, he enlists the help of various artisans and participates in a renowned fashion competition.

programme.title: Arjun Patiala
programme.desc: Gopala Rao, an atheist, finds himself in the midst of crisis. The entry of Govinda Hari into his home and life changes things for him.

programme.title: Arjun Patiala
programme.desc: Gopala Rao, an atheist, finds himself in the midst of crisis. The entry of Govinda Hari into his home and life changes things for him.

programme.title: Sultan
programme.desc: Salman Khan stars as the wrestler looking for a comeback with the help of Anushka Sharma. Classic box office topping underdog tale. (2016).

programme.title: Zameer (2005)
programme.desc: Pooja gets married to Suraj but feels guilty for separating him from Supriya, his former fiancee. When Suraj learns the truth he abandons her, oblivious to the fact that she is pregnant.

programme.title: Veer- Zaara
programme.desc: Yash Chopra's epic story of love between an Indian solider Veer Pratap Singh (Shahrukh Khan) and Zaara Hayaat Khan (Preity Zinta) from Pakistan. Also starring Rani Mukerji. (2004).

programme.title: Chak De India
programme.desc: The story of a hockey player who returns to the game as a coach of a women's hockey team.

programme.title: Dum Laga Ke Haisha
programme.desc: A marriage is arranged between a slim guy and an overweight girl.

programme.title: Gangster
programme.desc: Simran, who relocates to Seoul, is distraught when Daya, a gangster, re-enters her life. She has to make a choice between him and her lover Akash, who is a singer at an Indian restaurant.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

programme.title: Marriage Bureau
programme.desc: Marriage Bureau.

programme.title: Marriage Bureau
programme.desc: Marriage Bureau.

programme.title: Hindi Medium
programme.desc: Raj and Mita Batra yearn to get Pia, their daughter, educated from a posh school. When they learn that their background is holding her back, they are willing to go to any lengths to change her fate.

programme.title: Salaam Namaste
programme.desc: A quirky tale about life and relationships with an endearing look at what being in love really means. Popular romcom starring Saif Ali Khan and Preity Zinta. (2005).

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

programme.title: Paagalpanti
programme.desc: Three men, perceived as losers by society, wish to earn quick money and get rich. They, along with their respective girlfriends, hatch a plan to con two gangsters and steal their money.

programme.title: Jai Mummy Di
programme.desc: The trials and tribulations a couple has to undergo due to the dynamics between their respective mothers.

programme.title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
programme.desc: A In India gangsters are called Bhai. One such Bhai is Munna who cons his village-based parents into believing that he is a doctor.

programme.title: Patel Ki Punjabi Shaadi
programme.desc: Hasmukh Patel, a Gujarati man, finds himself at odds with his new neighbour, Guggi Tandon. To add to his woes, their children fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Yes Boss
programme.desc: Rahul's boss Siddharth is a womaniser who blackmails Rahul into helping him win over Seema. But Rahul ends up falling in love with Seema and is torn between his career aspirations and his sweetheart.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Vikram, an Indian intelligence agent who visits Sri Lanka on a secret mission, finds himself embroiled in a civil war and a conspiracy to kill the former prime minister of India.

programme.title: Yamraaj
programme.desc: Kishan and Birju, two criminals, work for the dreaded don, Yamraaj. While Birju enjoys working for him, Kishan decides to leave the crime world after killing an honest police officer.

programme.title: Luck
programme.desc: Musa, a mafia leader, gives a bunch of people an opportunity to turn their luck around and earn a hefty amount. They are required to play games while people bet on them.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Ishqiya
programme.desc: Khalujan and Babban, two rogues, fall in love with Krishna, their friend's widow. However, Krishna manipulates them into carrying out her bidding for her selfish gain.

programme.title: Ghar Ho To Aisa
programme.desc: Amar's mother rules her house like a dictator and tortures her daughter-in-law, Sharda. After Sharda and her daughter die, Amar decides to teach his cruel family a lesson with the help of Seema.

programme.title: Airlift
programme.desc: Ranjit Katiyal, an Indian businessman, leads a happy and successful life in Kuwait with his family. However, when Iraq invades Kuwait, he decides to risk his life to save his stranded countrymen.

programme.title: Boss
programme.desc: After his father disowns him, a businessman raises Surya like his own son. Years later, Surya transforms himself into Boss and fights for the rights of the deprived sections of society.

programme.title: Jungbaaz
programme.desc: Arjun is falsely convicted and Advocate Saxena is ridden with guilt for prosecuting him. However, the two men resolve their conflict and join hands to bring the real culprits to justice.

programme.title: Sone Pe Suhaaga
programme.desc: A businessman's wallet is stolen by a pickpocket, which inadvertently reunites him with his long-lost family. However, this incident also puts all their lives at risk from a powerful gangster.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: After Major Vijay Malhotra's colleagues betray him, he is branded as a traitor and subsequently killed. But his son, Vicky, vows to take revenge on his father's murderers and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Shaandaar
programme.desc: Jagjinder Joginder, a wedding planner, brings together the dysfunctional family of businessman Bipin Arora while making arrangements for his daughter's destination wedding in London.

programme.title: OK Jaanu
programme.desc: Adi and Tara are ambitious people who fall in love after meeting at a wedding. They decide on a no-strings-attached live-in relationship, but doubt their decision when their careers pull them apart.

programme.title: Hum Tum Aur Ghost
programme.desc: Armaan has a loving girlfriend and a perfect life, but the only problem is that he can talk to wandering spirits. So, he sets out to fulfil the wishes of these souls in order to help them cross over.

programme.title: Fraud Saiyaan
programme.desc: Bhola, a con artist, travels around the city wooing various women into marrying him in a bid to satisfy his monetary needs. However, he soon gets into trouble due to his dishonest ways.

programme.title: Pyaar Diwana Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sunder, an uneducated man, pretends to be someone who is unable to speak in order to win the compassion of a smart city girl with a big heart.

programme.title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
programme.desc: Munna Bhai, a gangster, meets Komal and instantly falls in love with her. In a bid to marry her, he must fight with Komal's elder brother, Dr Rastogi, and her lover, Raja.

programme.title: Toh Baat Pakki!
programme.desc: Rajeshwari considers Rahul to be a perfect match for her sister Nisha and invites him to be their tenant. However, she rejects Rahul immediately after she meets Yuvraj, a better match for her sister.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. Later, Raju comes across a pregnant Sharmila, who has been jilted by her boyfriend, and decides to help her but ends up sabotaging his love life.

programme.title: Meri Jung: One Man Army
programme.desc: When Mass decides to marry Anjali, a gangster's daughter, her father tries to kill Mass, but his best friend, Adi gets killed. Mass sets out to avenge Adi's death.

programme.title: Kachche Dhaage
programme.desc: Stepbrothers Aftab and Jai, who loathe each other, must learn to put aside their differences and work together to prove their innocence in a terrorism case.

programme.title: Rangoon
programme.desc: Julia journeys to the Indo-Burma border to perform for the troops during World War II, on the insistence of Billimoria, her lover. There, she finds herself enamoured by Jemadar Malik, a soldier.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Vikram, an Indian intelligence agent who visits Sri Lanka on a secret mission, finds himself embroiled in a civil war and a conspiracy to kill the former prime minister of India.

programme.title: Zindagi Ek Sangharsh
programme.desc: When the lives of five individuals living in different places intersect, it results in the transformation of their persona and purpose.

programme.title: Dangerous Khiladi 4
programme.desc: Sreenu and Shruthi fall in love after he chases away his rival Bhavani. However, Sreenu falls into trouble when Rajanna kidnaps Shruthi and asks Sreenu to marry his daughter.

programme.title: Gollu Aur Pappu
programme.desc: Two brothers, Gollu and Pappu, confront Gustaad Khan, a terrorist, for blowing up their garage. However, he decides to take advantage of their innocence by making them deploy a bomb in Ludhiana.

programme.title: Dil Hai Tumhaara
programme.desc: Shalu, a feisty young girl, falls in love with her employer's son, Dev. But she decides to sacrifice her love after she learns that her own sister, Nimmi, is also in love with him.

programme.title: Choti Sarrdaarni
programme.desc: After learning about Meher's pregnancy, her politically ambitious mother, Kulwant Kaur, gets her lover killed and forces her to marry Sarabjeet, a well-connected widower with a five-year-old son.

programme.title: Bawara Dil
programme.desc: Following a few misunderstandings, Siddhi and Shiva begin to loathe each other. Soon, their intense dislike turns into hatred and they get married with the determination to destroy each other.

programme.title: Namak Issk Ka
programme.desc: Kahani, a dancer who is also known as Chamcham, is abominated by society for entertaining people for money. Her life takes a turn when she unexpectedly gets married into a reputed family.

programme.title: The Great Indian Global Kitchen
programme.desc: Celebrity chefs cook traditional Indian recipes with an international touch to them to improve the flavour and the style of presentation according to global standards.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: A business tycoon's son falls in love with his childhood sweetheart, an orphan. However, things take an unusual turn when she is adopted by a rich family.

programme.title: Ramayana
programme.desc: With the help of an army of monkeys, Prince Rama, along with his brother Lakshmana, goes on a quest to rescue his beloved wife, Sita, from the clutches of Ravana, the demon king of Lanka.

programme.title: Choti Sarrdaarni
programme.desc: After learning about Meher's pregnancy, her politically ambitious mother, Kulwant Kaur, gets her lover killed and forces her to marry Sarabjeet, a well-connected widower with a five-year-old son.

programme.desc: Kahani, a dancer who is also known as Chamcham, is abominated by society for entertaining people for money. Her life takes a turn when she unexpectedly gets married into a reputed family.

programme.title: Udaariyan
programme.desc: Jasmine, who lives in a small village in Punjab, dreams of flying to Canada and leading a rosy life there. She is unaware that Fateh is crazily in love with her and wants to help fulfil her dreams.

programme.title: Choti Sarrdaarni
programme.desc: After learning about Meher's pregnancy, her politically ambitious mother, Kulwant Kaur, gets her lover killed and forces her to marry Sarabjeet, a well-connected widower with a five-year-old son.

Watch the story of Heer’s life and her journey of discovering her identify.

programme.title: Barrister Babu
programme.desc: Anirudh, a young lawyer from London, stops the wedding of an eight-year-old girl, Bondita, with an old man. When he is forced to marry her himself, he mentors her to fight for her rights.

programme.title: Molkki
programme.desc: A victim of bride buying, a social evil prevalent in India's heartland, Purvi is married off to Virender, who is double her age and a widower with children from his first wife.

programme.title: Sasural Simar Ka 2
programme.desc: Gitanjali Devi entrusts Simar Bhardwaj with the task of finding an ideal bride for her grandson. Simar's quest ends when she meets her namesake, Simar Narayan, who dreams of making it big as a singer.

programme.title: Pinjara Khubsurati Ka
programme.desc: Mayura, a young woman, leads an unhappy life because the people around her recognise her for her beauty and not for her skills and accomplishments.

programme.desc: Set on a long English summer in the early 1980s, two young boys attempted to make a film inspired by First Blood.

programme.title: A.P Bio (Season 03)
programme.desc: Katie Holmes Day - Jack's jealousy drives him to try to ruin the local holiday, Katie Holmes Day.

programme.title: The 4400 (Season 1)
programme.desc: Pilot Part 2 - The 4400 returnees have been missing from months to years. None have any memory of where they've been, none have aged, and a small number are beginning to manifest paranormal abilities.

programme.title: The Daily Show (Season 26)
programme.desc: As the coronavirus keeps millions confined to their homes, Trevor reports on the pandemic from the comfort of his couch and The Daily Show correspondents weigh in on the crisis from a safe social distance.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: A literature and gambler's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation is his relationship with one of his students.

programme.title: Outside Providence
programme.desc: When a teenager gets in a wreck with a police car, his dad enrolls him in a private prep school. Even though he's out of place, outclassed and seriously outnumbered.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: On his first big challenge since becoming the Dragon Warrior, Po must lead his friends and fellow kung fu masters to defeat his most threatening rival yet.

programme.title: Things We Lost in the Fire
programme.desc: Audrey Burke is reeling from the shock of the news that has just been delivered to her door by the local police: her warm and loving husband Brian, has been killed in a random act of violence.

programme.title: Catch-22 (Season 01)
programme.desc: Episode 4 - On a surreal trip, Yossarian begins to realize the magnitude and influence of Milo's business empire.

programme.title: Against the Ropes
programme.desc: A sassy, brassy boxing manager-in-the-making is determined to change "Lethal" Luther Shaw from a mere street punk into a world-class prizefighter.

programme.title: Dwight In Shining Armor (Season 01)
programme.desc: Peanut - Dwight fosters a dog named Peanut; Gretta and Baldric swear the puppy is actually a demonic beast.

programme.title: Dwight In Shining Armor (Season 01)
programme.desc: Lotions and Potions - Gretta is kidnapped; Dwight, Baldric, and Chlodwig set out to uncover the identity of the villain.

programme.title: Key & Peele (Season 02)
programme.desc: Dubstep - Two friends discuss their theories on what happens to their poop.

programme.title: No Activity (Season 02)
programme.desc: By the Siege Side - Marco and Frankie are victims in the nicest hostage situation ever. Fatima inserts herself in the middle of an awkward love triangle. An annoying visitor joins Cullen and Tolbeck in Car 27.

programme.title: Murder In Tours
programme.desc: A controversial sculptor is found murdered beside one of his artworks, which has been vandalized with Latin inscriptions. Commander Louise works with her son Sylvain to decode the crime; the clues lead them to disturbing truths about the artist’s works.

programme.title: The Empty Hours
programme.desc: 17-year-old Sebastian is placed in charge of running a motel in Veracruz. There, he meets Miranda, a regular customer whose married lover always keeps her waiting and an ambiguous game of flirtation commences between them.

programme.title: Real Guys
programme.desc: After a failed modelling stint, Jonas returns home penniless and to a son who doesn’t recognise him. When he’s offered the job to be a stripper, the fast cash attracts him. But how will he hide this embarrassing secret from his son and new love interest?

programme.title: The Coroner: The Plague
programme.desc: A man infected by the plague is found dead in a boat moored at a marine. Detectives discover strong evidence that shows he was not infected by chance but that someone had inoculated him with the bacteria - someone who was in his inner circle.

programme.title: Lose My Self
programme.desc: After Lena becomes diagnosed with meningitis and loses her biographical memory, her spouse tries to help her regain her sense of self. But identity is amorphous, and Lena is straddled between recovering her lost identity and finding a renewed self.

programme.title: Murder In Oleron
programme.desc: An old-man is found naked, stabbed and contorted in a fetal position in a cemetery. Investigations soon prompt Judith, the police captain, to reopen the unsolved file of a young woman’s disappearance from the “little church” community 28 years-ago.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Ice Forest
programme.desc: In this high altitude noir, Pietro, a young technician, is sent to repair a power plant of a village in the Alps plagued by blackouts. There, he encounters strange disappearances. As secrets spill, terror reigns. Starring Oscar Nominee Emir Kusturica.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Murder In Tours

programme.desc: Paul is a bachelor and a charming womanizer. But his life takes an abrupt turn when he falls deeply in love with Iris, an engaged woman. With the help of his best guy pals and his Rottweiler dog, he goes all out to woo her with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved

programme.title: The Spy
programme.desc: Inspired by a thrilling spy story featuring Nazi Germany’s top female spy, Vera von Schalburg. Known as “The Beautiful Spy”, she mysteriously vanished after being caught by the British secret service MI5. Woman, mother, mistress, spy – and double agent.

programme.title: Ice Forest
programme.desc: In this high altitude noir, Pietro, a young technician, is sent to repair a power plant of a village in the Alps plagued by blackouts. There, he encounters strange disappearances. As secrets spill, terror reigns. Starring Oscar Nominee Emir Kusturica.

programme.title: Leander's Final Journey
programme.desc: In this drama about reconciling the past with the present and the power of hope, a former WWII officer travels to Ukraine with his granddaughter to find the only woman he ever loved - just as a new war breaks out in the former Soviet Union in 2014.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Hermaphrodite
programme.desc: At the bottom of a cliff near Bordeaux, a corpse – composed of the bust of a white woman sewn to the legs of a black man – is found. Detectives Alex and Antoine know that the killer is making a sick statement but they struggle to decipher his motive.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Dead Girls From Vienna
programme.desc: After a car bomb attack that killed his wife and left him blind, Inspector Haller remains determined to track down the murderer. With the help of a streetwise taxi driver, he tracks down the psychopath and sees that justice is served through to the end.

programme.title: The Owners
programme.desc: Forced to leave the city, three siblings return to their family home in a quiet village. But, the District Officer’s alcoholic brother has been squatting there for 10 years and the police are making their lives hell as they fight to get their house back.

programme.title: Volubilis

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Dead Girls From Vienna
programme.desc: After a car bomb attack that killed his wife and left him blind, Inspector Haller remains determined to track down the murderer. With the help of a streetwise taxi driver, he tracks down the psychopath and sees that justice is served through to the end.

programme.title: Houston
programme.desc: Clemens is a corporate headhunter and an alcoholic with marriage woes. Hoping to get a fresh start, he jumps at a job opportunity for a major client and winds up in Houston. However, under the merciless Texan sun, things don’t go quite as planned.

programme.title: The Owners
programme.desc: Forced to leave the city, three siblings return to their family home in a quiet village. But, the District Officer’s alcoholic brother has been squatting there for 10 years and the police are making their lives hell as they fight to get their house back.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time Was I, Veronica
programme.desc: This film depicts a young woman, Veronica, navigating the crossroads of urban life in Brazil’s most violent city. She goes through fleeting romances until she is presented with her ailing father’s final wish: find true love before he passes away.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Survivor
programme.desc: The body of a woman in her fifties is found in a forest but autopsy results reveal musculature that is incompatible with her age group and ritual-like post mortal evidence. Detective Antoine looks back to her extraordinarily childhood for clues.
