programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Death doesn't take no for an answer. Death is coming. And Alex Browning is cursed with knowing when, how and where the grim reaper will take his next victim to the Final Destination. After boarding a plane to Europe with his fellow French club members, high school student Alex Browning (Devon Sawa) has a premonition of the aircraft exploding moments after takeoff, killing every on board. Alex panics, insisting that everyone get off the plane. In the melee than ensues, seven people, including Alex, are forced to disembark--saving them from a fiery death when the plan explodes as Alex foresaw. But as, one by one, each of these seven who cheated fate meets an untimely end, Alex and his remaining friends band together to try change destiny andoutwit the untamable forces of death.

Jackson (Star Wars III: Revenge of the Sith) to thwart the twisted scheme of a deadly assassin to eliminate a key witness in an upcoming trial -- and kick some serpentine asps! Director David Ellis (Cellular, Final Destination 2) ups the velocity in this adrenaline rush of a picture with no-holds-barred performances from Rachel Blanchard (Without a Paddle), Julianna Margulies ("ER"), Nathan Philips ("Wolf Creek") and more. Giving new meaning to cold-blooded terror, the friendly skies will never be the same!

programme.desc: Michael befuddles a hardware store patron with a collapsible spray paint can, and cuts a costume shop employee down to size when he shrinks into a leprechaun outfit. Later, a museum employee makes the discovery of a lifetime when a preserved egg hatches a baby dinosaur.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 11
programme.desc: Tonight, Michael tries to pull a fast one on burger joint patrons with his inflatable hot dogs and his unusual technique for bagging buns. Then he creeps out a flea market vendor when he brings an acrylic encased arachnid back to life, and later his co-worker doesn't give a hoot about her job at the camping store when an owl takes over their display.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 12
programme.desc: Michael hits the jackpot at a convenience store and amazes a mother when he demonstrates her child's genius abilities at a toy store. Later, MIchael astonishes his Japanese restaurant co-worker with a set-up that really takes the cake.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 12
programme.desc: When parents accuse Veronica of providing a fake ID to their son, who's now in an alcohol-induced coma, and files suit, the search to find who's responsible leads Veronica to a clandestine, exclusive organization operating on Neptune High's campus with a possible connection to Duncan. Meanwhile, Aaron Echolls (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) hires Keith to find out who's supplying pictures to the tabloids that humiliate his wife, Lynn (recurring guest star LISA RINNA). Later, Veronica hides an electronic device in the office of guidance counselor Rebecca James (recurring guest star PAULA MARSHALL) to eavesdrop on grief counseling sessions and learns some surprising information about her friends.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 13
programme.desc: After being hired by hip-hop heavyweight Percy "Bone" Hamilton (ANTHONY ANDERSON - "Kangaroo Jack," "Barbershop") to find his kidnapped daughter, Veronica and Keith look to the music mogul's long list of enemies and family members and the girl's Neptune High social circle for clues to her whereabouts. Meanwhile, following his mother's apparent suicide, Logan cynically endures the effusive displays of grief by his father, Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN), as they prepare for the memorial ceremony.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 14
programme.desc: After one of Neptune High's haughtier students brings a sexual harassment suit against a favorite teacher, Veronica is pitted against her father when the girl's parents hire Keith to help in their case. Meanwhile, with the tabloids claiming his momis still alive, Logan turns to Veronica to help him track down the truth. Later, Veronica discovers more unsettling information about Duncan's hidden medical condition.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 15
programme.desc: To her surprise, Veronica works as a "love detective" when she's asked to track down her friend Meg's (recurring guest star ALONA TAL) secret admirer and a Russian bride's estranged fiancé. Meanwhile, after discovering that a credit card belongingto Lynn Echolls, who apparently committed suicide recently, is being used, Veronica and Logan go to a Los Angeles hotel in hopes of finding either her or a clue. Recurring guest star ALYSON HANNIGAN ("Buffy The Vampire Slayer") appears as Logan's half sister Trina Echolls.

programme.title: Man Of Steel
programme.desc: Superman takes to the skies once more as Henry Cavill dons the mantle of the Man of Steel -- wrestling with a past he can't comprehend and a future he cannot escape. With an all-star cast that includes Diane Lane and Kevin Costner as Clark's earthbound parents; Oscar winner Russell Crowe as Superman's Kryptonian father; Amy Adams as Daily Planet reporter Lois Lane; Laurence Fishburne as editor Perry White; and Michael Shannon as Superman's otherworldly archenemy General Zod, the sky's the limit for the last son of Krypton. Alive with the directorial stylings of 300's Zack Snyder and the production team behind Christopher Nolan's Dark Knight trilogy, Man of Steel offers up an entirely new Superman: alienated, misunderstood, but forever a beacon of hope for all humanity.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Series Premiere: Signature Dish - The 14 contestants were given 75 minutes to cook their signature dish. The contestants who cooked the top 2 dishes won the opportunity to bang the "immunity gong".

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Immunity Challenge: Honey - The contestants were shown how to extract honey from a Flow Hive. The contestants were then tasked to create a dish centred on honey.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Elimination Challenge: Blindfold Taste Test - All the contestants, other than Carter and Georgia, were faced with the Jar Taste Test, where they were blindfolded and tasked with identifying a variety of ingredients inside jars.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Old & Young Mystery Box - This week's Mystery Box consist of blue cheese, dates, aged balsamic, black garlic, dry-aged sirloin, red dwarf apples, baby basil, baby snapper, baby carrots and beetroots, baby potatoes, and baby cauliflower.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Immunity Challenge: Keeping Up with Andy - Filo, Laura, Ruby, and Vienna had to replicate Andy's chipotle scotch fillet tacos, burnt jalapeño and avocado cream, and roasted corn salsa. They were not given a recipe and had to plate the dish within 30 seconds.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Elimination Challenge: Doughnuts Topping & Fillings - This week elimination challenge is set by Morgan Hipworth. The contestants are required to create a topping and filling for the doughnuts given by Morgan in 45 minutes, where the best three dishes will be safe.

programme.title: StoriesTogether
programme.desc: Man's Best Friend - In this intimate documentary, we explore the relationship between dog and owner through the eyes of Singapore residents who have all learned one thing; that owning a dog will change your life.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Elimination Challenge: Winter Wonderland - The contestants entered the kitchen to find it snowing. The first round is an ice cream taste test. The second round is a pressure test in which they need to recreate Darren Purchase's "Snow".

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3
programme.desc: Curtis Stone's Immunity Mystery Box - In this mystery box challenge, the contestants were challenged to make a potato dish, with the top dishes guaranteeing their makers a spot in the semi-finals.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8
programme.desc: The Hailstones are faced with a life-or-death decision in high tide. Ricko DeWilde enlists the aid of his children to maintain the family homestead.

programme.title: The Story of China S1
programme.desc: In the backstreets and markets of Xi'an, Michael meets descendants of the traders from central Asia and Persia who came into China on the Silk Road.

programme.title: Wild Birds Of Australia 1 - Aerial Hunters
programme.desc: Get to know Australia’s fiercest birds of prey. Find out how highly specialized killers like falcons, eagles, ospreys, and owls use special senses and traits to survive.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Ebony Plain
programme.desc: Bustling with wildlife, a grassland lies at the heart of Zambia’s Luangwa Valley known to locals as "The Ebony Plain". It’s a busy little neighbourhood - home to a family of warthogs, a troop of baboons and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Watch as life and death unfold on a daily basis in this corner of the Zambian wilds.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Kalahari
programme.desc: Explore a region that provides shelter to a wide array of life, despite its harsh conditions. Whether burrows of nocturnal bat-eared foxes or massive colonies of harvester ants, this ecosystem offers a wealth of resources to its native wildlife.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary
programme.desc: Journey to a vast underwater rainforest of kelp that’s home to hundreds of species of fish, forming the largest marine sanctuary in the U.S. Nearly destroyed by overfishing and pollution, this spectacular ecosystem is once again teeming with life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - The Mesoamerican Reef
programme.desc: After decades of overfishing and tourist activity, the second-longest barrier reef in the world is in jeopardy. But ocean advocates have lined the reef with a series of protected areas dedicated to maintaining its feeding and spawning grounds.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Ebony Plain

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits
programme.desc: Follow Kenyan capture teams to the Somali border to catch 50 rare and endangered antelope that need to be relocated into a predator-free conservancy. With no roads and the two nations at war, the operation must be carried out by helicopter.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Chasing Freedom
programme.desc: Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poacher’s snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia 1 - Elephant Valley
programme.desc: Follow a family of elephants from sunrise to sunset as they are joined by a cast of characters in a valley that is bursting with life. But in the dry season temperatures soar and drought grips the land.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Gate of the Mist
programme.desc: Strike out into the stunning landscapes surrounding Ol Pejeta. Get a closer look at Mount Kenya, the towering neighbour of the reserve. Take in a sunrise over the mountain, which is one of the most beautiful natural sights in all of Africa.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Are they guinea pigs, beavers, or something else? Capybaras embody the features of several different animals at once, as do warthogs, anteaters, and other fascinating genetic hybrids. Learn why these wannabes display such particular physical traits.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary
programme.desc: Journey to a vast underwater rainforest of kelp that’s home to hundreds of species of fish, forming the largest marine sanctuary in the U.S. Nearly destroyed by overfishing and pollution, this spectacular ecosystem is once again teeming with life.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Chasing Freedom
programme.desc: Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poacher’s snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Nature Scenes 1 - Baby Tahr
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted footage of two baby tahrs playing, climbing, eating and sleeping as they move about their daily lives. Animals filmed in captivity at Australia's Queensland Zoo.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Eclipse of the Pride Lands
programme.desc: How close would you get to a wild lion? The staff members have to decide for themselves when a tricky job comes up: getting radio-transmitting collars onto a pride of these big cats in order to track their movements.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Tricksters
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia 1 - Wild Heaveyweights
programme.desc: In Zambia’s Luangwa Valley some of the largest animals on earth live side by side. Discover how each of these giants uses ingenious strategies and amazing adaptations, honed over millions of years, to survive-and thrive.

programme.title: Wild Birds Of Australia 1 - The Feathering Nest
programme.desc: Meet four bird species that go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young. See how they protect their territory from invaders, attract the ideal mate, and safeguard their chicks to give them the best chance at life.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Drought Begins
programme.desc: Many species call Zambia’s Luangwa Valley home, but it has one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable-no rain for seven months and extreme temperatures. Yet for some animals, the dry season means opportunity.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Ngorongoro Crater - Cursed Heaven
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into a crater formed from the remains of a 2.5 million-year-old imploded volcano. See how the crater’s plentiful land provides a home for key species, while its isolation also threatens their existence.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits
programme.desc: Follow Kenyan capture teams to the Somali border to catch 50 rare and endangered antelope that need to be relocated into a predator-free conservancy. With no roads and the two nations at war, the operation must be carried out by helicopter.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Ngorongoro Crater - Cursed Heaven
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into a crater formed from the remains of a 2.5 million-year-old imploded volcano. See how the crater’s plentiful land provides a home for key species, while its isolation also threatens their existence.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia 1 - Wild Heaveyweights
programme.desc: In Zambia’s Luangwa Valley some of the largest animals on earth live side by side. Discover how each of these giants uses ingenious strategies and amazing adaptations, honed over millions of years, to survive-and thrive.

programme.title: Wild Birds Of Australia 1 - The Feathering Nest
programme.desc: Meet four bird species that go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young. See how they protect their territory from invaders, attract the ideal mate, and safeguard their chicks to give them the best chance at life.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits
programme.desc: Follow Kenyan capture teams to the Somali border to catch 50 rare and endangered antelope that need to be relocated into a predator-free conservancy. With no roads and the two nations at war, the operation must be carried out by helicopter.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Chasing Freedom
programme.desc: Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poacher’s snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Drought Begins
programme.desc: Many species call Zambia’s Luangwa Valley home, but it has one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable-no rain for seven months and extreme temperatures. Yet for some animals, the dry season means opportunity.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Ngorongoro Crater - Cursed Heaven
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into a crater formed from the remains of a 2.5 million-year-old imploded volcano. See how the crater’s plentiful land provides a home for key species, while its isolation also threatens their existence.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.desc: Meet four bird species that go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young. See how they protect their territory from invaders, attract the ideal mate, and safeguard their chicks to give them the best chance at life.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Eclipse of the Pride Lands
programme.desc: How close would you get to a wild lion? The staff members have to decide for themselves when a tricky job comes up: getting radio-transmitting collars onto a pride of these big cats in order to track their movements.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Tricksters
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits
programme.desc: Follow Kenyan capture teams to the Somali border to catch 50 rare and endangered antelope that need to be relocated into a predator-free conservancy. With no roads and the two nations at war, the operation must be carried out by helicopter.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Gates of Hell
programme.desc: A Hawaiian volcano called Kilauea is one of the most active in the world. After years of constant lava activity, see how a sudden collapse of the crater floor and a massive eruption drains it of lava, making the volcano possible to explore.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Gros Morne
programme.desc: The alien terrain of Gros Morne is the result of an earth-shattering collision of continents nearly 500 million years ago. Take a rare view of one of the world’s geographic wonders through soaring aerial shots of glacier-carved fjords and cliffs.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Chile
programme.desc: Vast salt flats, volcanoes, and desert dunes make Chile’s Atacama Desert one of South America’s last great wild lands. Located more than 13,000 feet above sea level, it offers a remote outpost for scientists to explore the universe and its origins.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Bolivia
programme.desc: A rugged sky-high plain in the heart of Bolivia, the Andean Altiplano is a natural wonder full of creatures adapted to some of Earth’s most brutal habitats. Its surreal deserts, restless volcanoes, and vast seas have remained unchanged for millennia.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Utah
programme.desc: Zion National Park is a kingdom of towering rock in the rugged badlands of Utah. Combining soaring spires and a maze of narrow canyons carved from chaos, it tells the still-being-written story of our planet’s rich geological past.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 - Wild Coast Of South Africa
programme.desc: Researcher Andrea Marshall believes Mozambique-based manta rays may be attending the sardine run on South Africa’s Wild Coast. The question is: why? Follow researchers as they track the creatures to understand their unusual migrating patterns.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 - Save The Giants
programme.desc: Mozambique’s coastline is home to an array of marine life, but no species is safe from overfishing. Join the region’s leading researchers on their journey to find and understand one of the ocean’s most secretive creatures, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 - Macro Mozambique
programme.desc: The coast of Mozambique is home to giants, like humpbacks and whale sharks, but the tiniest species play just as big of a role in the ecosystem. Meet the scientists who are working against the clock to protect coastal creatures big and small.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Centre, where a harbour seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 - Life In The Food Chain
programme.desc: The ocean covers 70 percent of our planet and is home to as many as one million species, but it’s a group of microscopic organisms known as plankton that make the biggest impact. Learn how these tiny drifters help sustain all life on earth.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Sea Of Cortez
programme.desc: Journey to Cabo Pulmo, home to an extraordinary story of marine recovery. Once called ‘the aquarium of the world’ this near-pristine coral reef was nearly destroyed by reckless overfishing until the area’s fishermen stepped in with rescue efforts.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Palau Shark Sanctuary
programme.desc: In 2009, Palau created a shark sanctuary protecting more than 100 shark species. In 2014 they established the world’s largest marine sanctuary, a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries. But can Palau keep illegal fishing fleets at bay?

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Discover the majesty of the US’s most northern state. Shot in stunning HDR, travel from the breathtaking coves and bays of Baranof Island, to the Glacier Bay where humpback and killer whales navigate among towering glaciers and soaring mountains.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Fires of Pele
programme.desc: Visit Anak Krakatoa as it enters a violent phase. Known as “The Child of Fire,” this volcano is an ancestor of Krakatoa, a volcano known for the largest eruption in modern history. Will its descendant repeat the pattern?

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Arizona
programme.desc: Epic natural wonders are uncovered in the remote desert of the American southwest. From sweeping canyons bound by towering cliffs to fossilized dunes striped in desert red, the Paria Plateau is a geological marvel.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Bahamas
programme.desc: With more than one million acres of protected parks, the islands of the Bahamas are a haven for the migratory birds, green turtles, and rock iguanas that find sanctuary in sandstone cliffs, underwater caves, and pink-sand beaches.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Lake Superior
programme.desc: The greatest of the Great Lakes, with more fresh water than all of the others combined, Lake Superior lies alongside a rugged stretch of the Canadian Shield that’s home to black bears and the world’s fastest animal: the peregrine falcon.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Niagara
programme.desc: Famous for its falls, the Niagara Escarpment is an ancient wall of fossil-rich sedimentary rock that weaves its way through the Great Lakes region. It’s home to 1,900-year-old cedar trees, ancient settlements, and the fascinating Flowerpot Island.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Spring
programme.desc: Welcome spring’s arrival across Africa, and discover the life-giving gifts the season offers to the continent’s plant and animal life. Get a close-up look at animal families raising their young, and celebrate their emergence into the wider world.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer
programme.desc: Journey thousands of miles and observe the extremes that summer brings to Africa, from droughts and famine in some locations to abundance and feasting in others. Discover how this season tests the limits of animals and plants across the continent.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Autumn
programme.desc: Track autumn’s arrival in Africa and the epic migrations it kicks off. Peer into nooks and crannies, where some creatures find one last romance before cooler weather descends, while others enjoy seasonal feasts ahead of the leaner winter months.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Winter
programme.desc: Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Sight
programme.desc: Examine the extraordinary sense of sight in the animal world. Find out how caribou use UV light to avoid wolves, dragonflies see in slow motion, and more.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers
programme.desc: Explore sounds beyond the range of our human hearing. Find out how alligators use low pitch rumbles to make the water around them dance, bats use sound to see, and a converted camper van conducts the ultimate hearing test for elephants.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World
programme.desc: Uncover the powerful world of scent through animals that have pushed their sense of smell way beyond human limits. Dive into shark-infested waters and swarms of bees to witness these creatures' incredible abilities.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast
programme.desc: Monsoons sweep into Sri Lanka’s mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the island’s forests. Follow along from cloud forest to rainforest, mangrove to ocean’s edge. On this island the water cycle is creating special habitats for wildlife.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon 1 - Life On The Wing
programme.desc: Yala Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 bird species. Join them as they work to raise their young and find homes before the rains arrive. Discover a myriad of winged beauties from massive sea eagles to ornate flycatchers and tiny fantails.

programme.title: How to Win at Everything
programme.desc: See how to create a delicious fruit salad using karate moves and build a paper plane that can travel longer.

programme.title: How to Win at Everything
programme.desc: Discover the secret to cycle fast with less effort and the sort of vessel you should choose for minimal traveling time.

programme.title: Storm Rising
programme.desc: Hurricane Double Threat - Amid a record-breaking hurricane season, Reed and Mike race to collect data inside two hurricanes projected to make landfall on the U.S. Gulf Coast back-to-back.

programme.title: Legends of The Deep
programme.desc: Celine and Fabien dive deep in Shag Harbour, Nova Scotia, where they’re investigating one of the best documented UFO sightings in history.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Dallas shows challenging moves like handstands, running jumps and wing flips and he proves that only trained professionals can manage them properly.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Dallas teaches how to stay afloat on a raft without losing balance and how to avoid being flipped over in a sidecar.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt Compilations
programme.desc: Riches & Rulers - Archeologists in Egypts Valley of the Nobles unwrap the secret lives of people from the ancient past: a royal nurse, two children and a woman who served the rich and famous!

programme.desc: Giant Car Plant - Germany's Wolfsburg car factory is the largest in the world. This episode uncovers the engineering and production innovations hidden inside it.

programme.title: For The Love of Fashion

programme.title: Afgan: The Ride
programme.desc: From shy kid to star singer, Afgansyah Reza reveals how he was discovered singing karaoke and his difficulties dealing with fame and anxiety. This is his Ride.

programme.title: MTV Asks Jorja Smith @ Home
programme.desc: Snoochie Shy chats to Jorja Smith about her music, has a snoop on her phone, and asks her questions sent in by you guys, her fans around the world!

programme.title: MTV Hits
programme.desc: It's a Hits blitz here at MTV as we bring you your favourite hits and the latest videos back-to-back!

programme.title: Chart Attack
programme.desc: It's the battle of the pop-charts on MTV's weekly count-down featuring the hottest [current] hits in the music biz!

programme.title: The Show
programme.desc: The Show, a weekly variety music show from Korea's SBS Prism Tower, showcasing some of the biggest names in K-Pop, where viewers vote for The Show Choice winner and results are announced weekly.

programme.title: The Veronicas: Blood Is For Life (S1)
programme.desc: We give MTV's global audience an all access pass to the raw and honest reality Jess and Lisa Origliasso face living life in the spotlight as one of Australia's biggest music exports.

programme.title: The Veronicas: Blood Is For Life (S1)
programme.desc: We give MTV's global audience an all access pass to the raw and honest reality Jess and Lisa Origliasso face living life in the spotlight as one of Australia's biggest music exports.

programme.title: True Life Crime UK (S1)
programme.desc: Why was teen Champion Ganda knifed to death in broad daylight? MTV correspondent Linda Adey heads to East London to investigate a stabbing that sent shockwaves through a tight knit community.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo – but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Pineapple Of My Eye - Masikura tricks King Julien into believing that a pineapple contains all the souls and wisdom of the previous Julien Kings.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1
programme.desc: Clinging In The Rain / Raccoon Hoarder Picture Show - In this original series Harvey Street Kids, DreamWorks Animation Television takes you to an unusual place called Harvey Street where every day feels like best Saturday ever with never-ending games, a 42-flavor ice cream truck and the greatest climbing tree in town. Thanks to BFFs Audrey, Lotta, and Dot, Harvey Street is kept kid-ruled and adult-free for all the kids in town. They do whatever it takes - from creating an indestructible friendship bracelet to inventing a new holiday to fill the seemingly endless hours of a summer afternoon - to guarantee life is always great and Harvey Street is the best place to never grow up!

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2
programme.desc: Trolling Through Iceland - When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1
programme.desc: The Case Of The Tug Of War Rope - It's the annual Tug-of-War game in Daredale between the Pirates and the Ninjas. As the game starts the tug-of-war rope snaps. The game is cancelled until Noddy can find out who cut the rope. Using all his investigating skills and asking who, what, where, when, why and how questions Noddy follows all the clues. He discovers it was Scurvy who accidentally cut the rope. He was practicing for the tug of war game and didn't realise that his beak was so sharp! Now he can't take part in the game! Clever Noddy shows Scurvy how he can take still be a part of the game - by cheerleading! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Animals - All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm. And this time he makes sure the farm gate is shut properly! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa And Poorly Pia - Pia has hurt her wing and cant fly around or play so Raa Raa tries to find a way to cheer her up.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa Goes Clickety Clack - Raa Raa helps Ooo Ooo build a dominostyle chain of clickety clack logs that stretches all across the Jungle.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots
programme.desc: Poppy's Ice Cream Show - All the tots are picking fruit so Poppy can use it to make her famous ice cream. Stingo thinks he has come up with a much better plan to get hold of some ice cream without having to pick anything… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots
programme.desc: Painting Practice - Fifi wants to repaint her kitchen but Poppy has run out of paint. Can anybody else come up with an idea to brighten up her walls?

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secret…he's making a special gift for his favourite sister.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting – what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can I Cheer Up Kevin? - JESS, and his friends are looking after Kevin the carp while Horace goes to visit a friend. They decide to clean out HORACE's pond for him and take all the yukky pond weed to the river where the hungry fishes gobble it up. But when they get back they find that KEVIN is unhappy in his pond. “How can I cheer up Kevin?” That's the Big Question. First JESS thinks that KEVIN might be lonely so they take it in turns to keep him company. But KEVIN seems even more unhappy than before. Jess thinks that KEVIN is probably hungry. They saw the fish in the river eating weed so they go back to the river to get some for KEVIN. KEVIN gobbles up the weed, but he's soon looking sad again. JESS thinks that maybe staying in one place all the time is making KEVIN unhappy. So he gives him a little holiday in the river. KEVIN really perks up. A holiday seems to be the answer. Except that as soon as he's back in his pond KEVIN is miserable again. Horace comes back and explains to them s how pond weed helps fish to breathe, Jess r.

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can We Decorate The Christmas Tree? - It's Christmas Eve on Greendale Farm. Jess is very very excited. Every year Mimi decorates the special tree in the woods and the friends all gather around to sing and play and open presents. But when Jess, Mimi and Willow arrive to leave presents at the tree they're shocked to see that the wind has blown all the decorations away! How dreadful! - How will they celebrate Christmas with no decorations? And Mimi can't help as she and Willow have promised to deliver presents outside the farm. Jess promises to work it out ‘How can we decorate the Christmas Tree?' – that's the Big Question!. He searches the farm for decorations but cannot find them. Then he realises he's found some lovely natural things that they can use to MAKE decorations. Yippety Yay! Of course! So everyone pulls together and gathers fircones and teasels, straw and bulrushes. As they sing the wond.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Puffadder Sheds His Skin - You see there was a time when Puff Adder didn't shed his skin. All the animals were afraid of Puff Adder because he was very difficult to see and he had a nasty bite. Puff Adder decides that if no beast wants to be his friend then he doesn't want to have any friends. He slithers far, far away to the desert where he bumps into Camel and learns that every animal needs a friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Eagle Rules The Skies - You see there was a time when Eagle didn't rule the skies. She was a humble bird who kept herself to self. But then one day things start going wrong for the birds - some beast steals Hen's eggs, Hummingbird loses her hum and Tickbird goes missing! Eagle quietly saves the day and Lion rewards her with half his Kingdom. Tales from Africa.

programme.desc: Liam And The Kid's Big Day Out - When Liam announces he's babysitting Bubba Johnson, Sandra bets he won't last the day. Will Liam manage to get the upper hand with the 7-year-old delinquent or will he become another Cosmos High teen destroyed by Bubba?

programme.title: My Life Me

But the bet doesn't get really interesting until each of the podmates takes up a challenge pertaining to his or her own character faults. Soon the foursome is working to undermine each others' efforts in order to win the bet.

programme.desc: Sherman Exchange Program/Charles Dickens - Sherman trades places with a kid Emperor and learns that being king is harder than it seems and Peabody's new co-host is out of control.

programme.title: Denver The Last Dinosaur

George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1
programme.desc: The Case Of The Rules Of The Game - Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. They both think they are the winner and refuse to talk to one another. Noddy needs to find the missing rules or they might never be friends again! Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab. They were blown there by the wind from the Daisy Mill at the farm. Now the pirates and Pat-Pat can agree on who has won the game and are friends again. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1
programme.desc: The Case Of Smartysaurus's Rainbow Experiment - Noddy's back on the case when something goes wrong with Smartysaurus's rainbow experiment . He needs to investigate. He figures out that the rainbow colours have all been put in a different order. Using his investigation kit and all his who, what, why, where, when and how questions he e follows all the clues - which leads him eventually to Fuse's workshop. Fuse admits that he changed the order of the rainbow test tubes from colour to size order. He's very sorry for ruining the experiment! Noddy helps Smartysaurus reorder the colours and this time the Rainbow experiment is a huge success! Case closed!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Night Noises - Raa Raa and his friends get lost in the dark while out looking for fireflies but Raa Raa guides the way back home.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa Plays Do What I Do - Raa Raa is playing a new game called Do What I Do with his friends but a misunderstanding upsets Topsy.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots
programme.desc: Hide And Squeak - The twins are playing hide and seek with Pip but they all argue over who is the best at hiding? Can they make up their differences and play nicely together?

programme.desc: Night - The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: A Thuper Hero Thtory - Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky And The Wayward Wedding - Jim and Kate are getting married... or are they?

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1
programme.desc: Pretty In Pinkeye / The Monsters Are Due On Harvey Street - In this original series Harvey Street Kids, DreamWorks Animation Television takes you to an unusual place called Harvey Street where every day feels like best Saturday ever with never-ending games, a 42-flavor ice cream truck and the greatest climbing tree in town. Thanks to BFFs Audrey, Lotta, and Dot, Harvey Street is kept kid-ruled and adult-free for all the kids in town. They do whatever it takes - from creating an indestructible friendship bracelet to inventing a new holiday to fill the seemingly endless hours of a summer afternoon - to guarantee life is always great and Harvey Street is the best place to never grow up!

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space
programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavian’s Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over who’s in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2
programme.desc: Gibraltar Rocks! - When Wally and Wenda head to WWS Great Magic Key Vault, located in Gibraltar, to find Whitebeard a key for his birthday, they find that Odlulu has already cleaned out the vault; the Wanderers must round up all these keys, and they’ll have to do it in time for Whitebeard’s surprise birthday party.

programme.title: Denver The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Under House Arrest - Denver must stay in his house... where Spooky's remote-controlled troll haunts him!

programme.title: Denver The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Jurassic Avenger - Denver wants to uphold justice... But justice is a difficult concept for a dinosaur!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math/Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: You Oughta Be In Pictures / Crypt Critters - You Oughta Be in Pictures When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. Crypt Critters Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia Claus - It's almost Christmas, and Olivia and Ian can't wait for Santa to come. But there's one thing that Santa can't bring – Olivia's lost toy, her beloved monkey Mathilda. Olivia imagines herself to be a Santa Claus who returns lost toys. On Christmas morning Olivia finds new gifts under the tree and Mathilda right under her nose.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia Takes Ballet - Olivia is determined to dance just like the ballerinas she's seen in a ballet; the only thing she needs is a partner. Luckily, Uncle Garret (a professional football player) is visiting, and the two of them dance a surprisingly graceful pas de deux for Olivia's whole class.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Big Chris Gets Lucky - Big Chris realises that he only ever has good luck when he has his lucky mascot with him. But what happens when he loses it on race day?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Fun Run - Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Big Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it without even realising?

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can I Make The Trolley Go Faster? - Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can We Mend Baa’S Trough? - There's a hole in the bottom of Baa's trough so none of the thirsty friends can have a drink. How can we mend the trough, wonders Jess. Hey, that's the Big Question. Jess decides to ask Horace for help but Horace has a problem of his own. He's trying to make a lovely new musical sound but the square shaped piece of bark he's got doesn't make a very good noise when he clangs it with a stick. Jess borrows the bark to cover the hole in the trough but it's the wrong shape. He decides to ask Mimi for help with making a different shape to cover the hole. Mimi's making a mosaic, but she can't find anything the right shape to fit the square-shaped hole she has. Jess gives her the bit of bark and it fits perfectly! She sings Jess a shapes song explaining all about different shapes around us. Jess finds a squashed clay pot which is circle shaped. It's the perfect shape to mend the hole – and because it's clay the water won't leak out again! They've answered the question. And here comes the rain again so the.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Skunk Smells - You see there was a time when Skunk didn't smell. Skunk smelt as sweet as sweet can be. Infact, whenever any animal had a smelly problem they went straight to Skunk. And then one day naughty Baboon tricks Skunk into tasting the yucky Smellyfruit! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Cricket Crickets / Chirrups - You see there was a time when Cricket didn't chirrup. Infact Cricket didn't do anything at all and it was beginning to get him down. Every animal has a use. Elephant trumpets, Lion roars...but what does Cricket do? And then one day Cricket discovers that he has rhythm. Cricket finds the beat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Family Tree - Birch's romantic fate with Raffi takes one-step forward and another TWO backwards! It seems Birch and Liam might be related to Raffi. Sandra factors into the fray when it becomes obvious that her new work-study job at City Hall is essential to setting the record straight.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Just Say Nooo - Raffi, in a fit of people pleasing, becomes the “go to guy” for everyone one who needs a favour on the same day. Soon he's spread thinner than a steamrolled pancake and no one's getting the help they need — especially his own podmates.

programme.title: Veggietales: In The House
programme.desc: Veggiecards! / Grow-Tato - Larry and Bob make trading cards of everyone in the house, but Bob feels sad when no one wants his card./Motato invents a grow-ray and uses it to become a giant. It's up to Ultra Veggie Bob and Plantasaurus Larry to stop him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Three - : The mystery goop strikes again when Rocky’s stress ball falls into a vat of goop, making it sentient and gigantic! Now the stress ball is bouncing through New York City, getting bigger and bigger.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: The First Picture Show - When Thunk invents the first-ever movie using shadow puppets, everyone in Ahhh! Valley loves it...until they are shocked by the ending.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Ruff Guyz/George Crum - When Peabody gets carried away trying to create the perfect band using historical friends, Sherman must stop him from becoming a music monster.

The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.desc: Hard Luck Hardcase / Bee Story - Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: The Reflesherator / Master Blister - The Reflesherator When Professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers for the job. Master Blister The students of Scare School are thrilled after a prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia And The Crystal Ball - While Olivia and her brothers play fortune teller, baby William accidentally breaks Dad's new bowling trophy, When a friendly police officer shows up at the door selling raffle tickets, Olivia is convinced that he's come for William, and she devises a scheme to keep William safe from the “arms of the law”.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia Packs Up - Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel – which isn't all it's cracked up to be – and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: It's Go Go Go At Silver Hatch - Murray Walker is visiting Silver Hatch. Mr Carburettor would like him to commentate while the cars put on a stunt display. But Murray has other ideas… he admits he has always dreamed of racing himself. An unlikely candidate makes his dreams come true!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Heroes - Mr Carburettor's cousin Chubby is coming to Silver hatch as he wants to film his new blockbuster there. Everybody goes all out to prove that it is just the right location for Chubby's new film.

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: What’S That Green Hairy Stuff? - Jess and the puppies find some strange green hairy stuff growing under the water barrel. The puppies are scared of it and Jess promises them that he'll find out what it is at once. Hey, that's the big question! Jess thinks the green hairy stuff might be grass. He goes to ask Baa, who's a grass expert. Baa, Billie and Jess compare the green hairy stuff and ordinary grass using Billie's magnifying glass. It isn't grass but it is a plant. Mimi knows all about plants so they go to ask her about the green hairy stuff. She shows them the green hairy tops of carrots but they aren't like Jess's green hairy stuff either. Mimi's sure she's seen this green hairy stuff in other places around the farm. Jess thinks they should look around and see where it grows. There's green hairy stuff growing all over the farm in cool, damp places. Horace knows all about damp cool places. Perhaps he can help! Horace tells them that the green hairy stuff is a plant called moss and it's not scary at all. The puppies agree.

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can I Find My Friends? - Jess's friends have planned a special surprise but he can't find any of them to find out what it is! How can he find his friends? Hey, that's the Big Question! He finds a trail of Willow's hoof prints but they stop at a puddle. Then they follow a trail of wool from Baa but that stops too. They find a walking haystack but it turns out to be Mimi. Jess is baffled. He can't find anyone else! Mimi helps him realise that he followed clues which led him to her but before Jess can ask her anything else she rushes off. Hmm, thinks Jess, maybe if we follow the clues we found earlier they might lead us to our friends and the special surprise. Jess, Joey and Jinx follow the clues and finds all of their friends waiting for them at a special “Follow the Clues” surprise picnic! Jess found his friends by following the clues AND he's answered the Big Question! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Mole Lives Underground - You see there was a time when Mole didn't live underground. She had tiny weenie ears where every little sound made her ears hurt. Unfortunately Tinga Tinga could be a very noisy place. Then one night when Elephant's snoring, Jackal's howling and Owl's twit-twooing get too much Mole decides to DIG. She digs and she digs and she digs.... until she finds total quiet. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Squirrel Gathers Nuts - You see there was a time when Squirrel didn't gather nuts; she was far too busy braiding her bushy tail. Then one day there is very little food in Tinga Tinga and Lion summons all the animals to pull together and help find food for everyone. Squirrel is too busy braiding her tail to join in, but when she finally realises that there is not enough food to go round she races around gathering nuts for all the animals. The thing is she can't stop! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: At Odds With The Pod - Birch, Sandra, Liam and Raffi all have very different plans for how to spend their day, unfortunately they're also on a pod project with a fast approaching deadline. Instead of consulting with each other, each of the four kids follows his or her own path until it looks like academic disaster in inevitable.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Accept No Substitutes - The so-called maintenance of Mr. Towes' desk combined with an opinionated new substitute teacher have Birch convinced her favourite-teacher-ever has been exiled. What Birch doesn't know is that Mr. Towes is just preferring privacy and the new sub is a good friend.

programme.title: Veggietales: In The House
programme.desc: The Good Samaricumber / Destination: Space Station - Pa Grape tells LarryBoy the parable of the Good Samaritan./Bob and Larry set out to build a rocket to go to space.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Four - In an attempt to reverse Fearless Leader's goop-induced evil powers, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to an alternate reality to get an "anti-goop." Once there they discover opposite versions of everyone they know from the real world, including a NICE Boris and Natasha!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: I Knew That Was Gonna Happen/Sacagawea - After hearing a prediction that the world will end during the show, Sherman panics and Peabody must take control of the apocalypse situation.

programme.title: Denver The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Under House Arrest - Denver must stay in his house... where Spooky's remote-controlled troll haunts him!

programme.title: Denver The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Jurassic Avenger - Denver wants to uphold justice... But justice is a difficult concept for a dinosaur!

programme.desc: Boarding Beano - Doctor Pfooflepfeffer’s first act as Head of Governors is to turn Bash Street School into a boarding school. Duped into being held at school indefinitely, the pupils devise a series of daring attempts to escape.

programme.desc: Thumb Wars - In a somewhat misguided attempt to resolve Dennis and Walter’s spiralling competitiveness, Miss Mistry offers thumb wrestling as a solution. But can Walter play fair or will the situation get out of hand?

programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S03)
programme.desc: Bubble Scrubbies! - It seems like everyone in Bubbletucky is coming down with a cold-even Mr. Grouper! No need to worry; in their very own soap opera, the Guppies will use their good hygiene to show Mr. Grouper how to get better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S01)
programme.desc: Playdate with Magenta - Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta. During our search for clues, we identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel & Pail.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S05)
programme.desc: Babysitting Heroes - Blaze and AJ are helping their friend Stripes look after some baby animals, when the little critters accidentally float away on big bubbles. Now, it's up to these three babysitters to find their adorable animal friends and save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)

programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S01)
programme.desc: Playdate with Magenta - Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta. During our search for clues, we identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel & Pail.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S05)
programme.desc: Babysitting Heroes - Blaze and AJ are helping their friend Stripes look after some baby animals, when the little critters accidentally float away on big bubbles. Now, it's up to these three babysitters to find their adorable animal friends and save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S02)
programme.desc: Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the Paw Patrol!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus / Pups Save the Songbirds - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's Paw Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Cold Winter Day - It is a cold winter day. Peppa and George want to jump in muddy puddles, but the puddles are all frozen and slippery. It begins to snow and Peppa’s friends turn up with their toboggans. Everyone has lots of fun and the day ends with a toboggan race.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: The seven foods / The perfect portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Show and Tell Surprise - Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S01)
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names “Fuzzy” takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S01)
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it’s a “snow monster” and it’s scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S06)
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The Paw Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Meteor Shower / Paddington And The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S01)
programme.desc: Trouble at the Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S01)
programme.desc: Cattle Drive - When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher (S01)
programme.desc: Abby Loses Elvin / The Berry Thief - Abby tries to kitty-sit Elvin, but the kitten keeps running off and disappearing. // Abby has to stop chipmunks from stealing the veggies in the garden.

programme.title: Butterbean's Café (S02)
programme.desc: Cutie Pie's Pizza Pies! - Cricket loves playing with her new friend Cutie Pie, a pizza delivery truck that magically comes alive. Until Ms. Marmalady buys Cutie Pie and threatens to send her to the junkyard! Can Cricket find a way to save her friend?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S04)
programme.desc: Space Guppies! - When the evil robot Major Bummer tries to eliminate music from the galaxy, pop Princess Molly joins forces with sci-fi versions of the Guppies to restore peace, harmony, and melody! Will they reach the Bubblestar - a space station speaker - in time?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: Barba TV / The museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Rainy Day Rainbow - We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S03)
programme.desc: Tow Truck Tough! - Blaze transforms into a tow-truck - and, with the help of AJ and Gabby, sets off on a tow-tally awesome adventure to save Stripes.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S03)
programme.desc: Catch That Cake! - It’s Darington’s birthday! Crusher uses a robot plate to try and steal the birthday cake, but his plan goes awry and the cake goes rocketing away. Will Blaze catch the runaway cake before Crusher and save the party?

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S05)
programme.desc: Pups Rescue Thanksgiving / Pups Save a Windy Bay - The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! // A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S05)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S02)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the Paw Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Cake Bake Chaos - Calvin wants to make a GIANT surprise cake for Kaison. But when his Bigger / Smaller Baking Machine malfunctions, he has to summon his PLAY POWER to prevent a total cake-tastrophe!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Snow Day Play - With HQ in a heatwave, CALVIN is much too hot to play with his new cars. Luckily, it's icy cool in the Kid Cave. But when Calvin's cars transform into ice balls, he needs to use his PLAY POWER to think up a new way to play!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Mister Skinnylegs - George finds a spider in the bathroom sink, but Peppa is really frightened-until she realizes that it doesn't want to hurt her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S03)
programme.desc: Fruit Camp! - The Guppies love fruits and vegetables, but Deema doesn't want to try broccoli! When the Guppies face their scout troop initiation, Deema will have to turn over a new leaf if she wants to earn her broccoli badge.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Show and Tell Surprise - Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.
