programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S01)
programme.desc: Dragon Island Duel - It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a race around tropical Dragon Island! But when Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must set out to rescue his best friend and bring him back to the starting line.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S01)
programme.desc: Runaway Rocket - When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: The Night of the Turtles / Santiago's Regatta - When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher (S02)
programme.desc: The Peeper Transport Tubes / Abby Loses Her Glasses - The Squeaky Peepers cause Fuzzly trouble when Abby uses them to deliver packages to the guests. // When Abby loses her glasses, she depends on Bozzly and Flug to help her get them back.

programme.title: Butterbean's Café (S02)
programme.desc: Cherry Delicious! / Movie Night! - When Cricket eats the cherries for the Bean Team's pie, she "magics" some more and creates a cherry-tastrophe! // Ms. Marmalady messes with the Bean Team's Movie Night! Will there be a happy ending?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S04)
programme.desc: Sheep Doggy! - When Farmer Joe's cute baby lamb wanders off the farm during a popcorn storm, Bubble Puppy becomes a sheepdog to save the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: Barbazoo can't say ''no'' / The doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S03)
programme.desc: Animal Island - Blaze and Stripes sail to Animal Island - an incredible place inhabited by monster truck animals! But when a greedy lizard puts the island in peril, Blaze and Stripes must find their wild side to save their animal friends.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S03)
programme.desc: Toucan Do It! - Blaze, Starla, and Darington can’t wait to play every animal’s favorite sport: Jungle Ball! But when their teammate Tooks the Toucan gets launched from the stadium, it’s up to the friends to get her back in the game.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S05)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S05)
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday! // Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S02)
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone / Pups Save the Deer - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs! // Ryder and the Paw Patrol rescue a family of deer stuck on slippery ice!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Chinese New Year / Paddington And The Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Car Catastrophe - Calvin's remote control car has been turbo charged and is out of control! Can Calvin summon his PLAY POWER before the kid cave is totally destroyed?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Robot Round Up! - ROBO G's robot flock are loose on the dangerous Rock Block Mountain! Calvin launches a Robo Rescue Mission but the robots keep escaping! Calvin uses his PLAY POWER and calls on a special helper to save the runaway robots.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpa’s pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S03)
programme.desc: Bubble Kitty! - Molly and Gil find a lost kitten named Bubble Kitty, and the Guppies learn that house cats are related to big cats. When Bubble Kitty's owner calls, the kids take Bubble Kitty home to Meownt Rushmore, a rocky tribute to cats!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Hide and Seek with Blue - Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure Hunt - Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S05)
programme.desc: Toy Trouble! - The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! Only Blaze and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: The Night of the Turtles / Santiago's Regatta - When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S02)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - When the Paw Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: All Star Pups! / Pups Save Sports Day - It’s monkey mayhem as pups play kickball against Raimondo’s team, until an eagle steals the ball. // The All Star Pups are ready to compete in the summer sports day when Daring Danny X turns the field into an ice rink!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington and the Party / Paddington and the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Underwater Art - ROBO G takes Calvin on a deep sea adventure to find what he needs to finish his underwater artwork. But when a school of jellyfish blocks their path, Calvin must summon his PLAY POWER to be able to finish his masterpiece.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Super Spooky Surprise Party! - Someone (or something) has stolen the snacks for the spooky surprise party! It's up to Calvin and ROBO G to use their PLAY POWER to find them - if the mysterious 'Count Snackula' doesn't find them first.

programme.title: Ready Set Dance (S02)
programme.desc: All Aboard - All Aboard the dance train for tap-tacular adventure.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S01)
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup A Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster – Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodway’s purse chicken “Chickaletta” has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S01)
programme.desc: Pups Pit Crew / Pups Fight Fire - Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new “super trike”. // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S06)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Flying Disc Fling - Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The Paw Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch! // When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park. // DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S01)
programme.desc: Blaze of Glory - Blaze and his driver AJ are introduced to a world of racing Monster Machines. But when a truck named Crusher uses dirty tricks to try and win the Championship Race, Blaze will do everything to help his friends and beat Crusher to the finish line.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S06)
programme.desc: Pups Rescue a Rescuer / Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - Mayor Goodway tries to help the Paw Patrol rescue Danny, but the pups end up having to rescue the rescuer, too! // A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Chinese New Year / Paddington And The Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S02)
programme.desc: Dino Dash - Blaze and AJ are playing with their friend Zeg when he accidentally gets blasted by a geyser into a far away mud pit. It’s up to Blaze and AJ to save him, using engineering design inspired by their new dinosaur-truck friends.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S02)
programme.desc: Piggy 500 - Starla is excited to race with her prize pig Zippy in the Piggy 500! But when her competitor Crusher and his rude pig Slop cheat and send Zippy far away, it’s up to Blaze, AJ, and Starla to get Zippy back to the race in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo - After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Abby Hatcher (S02)
programme.desc: Teeny Terry is... TeenyMan! / Mo and Bo and the Missing Button Trail - Teeny Terry believes he's an actual super hero! Abby has to keep up the illusion so his feelings won't get hurt. // Abby and the Fuzzlies go sledding but they get lost when their trail home is covered up by snow.

programme.title: Butterbean's Café (S02)
programme.desc: Perfectly Perfect Pancakes! / The Delivery Game! - Cricket wants to make her teacher perfect pancakes, but she learns that they don't have to be perfect to be delicious! // Jasper keeps playing a video game instead of doing his work! Will he be able to make his important delivery in time?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S04)
programme.desc: The Summer Camp Games! - Summer is here! Molly, Gil, and the rest of the Guppies celebrate the season with lots of outdoor fun. Gil uses his summer camping skills to rescue Bubble Puppy during the Summer Camp Games!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: Barbabravo is not feeling well / Be patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Show and Tell Surprise - Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S03)
programme.desc: The Big Ant-venture - Blaze and Zeg are on Animal Island when they discover a world of tiny creatures right under their tires: Insect City! The friends transform into a super-strong ant and a bouncy grasshopper for their littlest big adventure yet!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S03)
programme.desc: Falcon Quest - In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S04)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save A Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S04)
programme.desc: Pups Save A Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S02)
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The Paw Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the Paw Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Fundraising Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Super Slimy Situation - All of Calvin's slime has gone off! ROBO G helps him create a fresh batch with a Super Slime Machine! But when the machine goes crazy, Calvin has to use his PLAY POWER to save the day.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Mega Power Needed - A sudden power failure leaves ROBO G critically low on battery and the whole kid cave in virtual darkness. It's up to Calvin to use his PLAY POWER to fix the Mega Power Maker and get ROBO G fully charged up!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Bone / Paddington Joins A Band - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa’s ball blows into the pond and George’s hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching “Detective Potato” on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Bedtime - It’s nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it’s been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S03)
programme.desc: Gobble Gobble Guppies! - Fall is here! Molly and Gil can't wait to pick pumpkins, but when they lead everyone to the pumpkin patch, the pumpkins are gone! Their turkey friend Giblet leads them on a hunt to find the culprits: the pumpkin patch pirates!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Big Dance Party - Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S05)
programme.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine - Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo - After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: Pups Get Growing / Pups Save a Space Toy - Fertilizer causes Yumi’s crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce! // The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Al’s field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Ultimate Outfit - Calvin accidentally messes up his clothes on the day of the Ultimate Hero Challenge. Luckily, ROBO G helps him create a brand new outfit, just in time. But will his PLAY POWER be enough for Calvin to score the trophy?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Birthday Diver - Calvin has lost ROBO G's birthday present. It's now being held captive by a mysterious underwater creature that loves shiny objects. Can he summon his PLAY POWER and find it?

programme.title: Ready Set Dance (S02)
programme.desc: Dance Bot - In the robot factory, Christian the robot needs some repairs...The Kid Crew know what to do!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Show and Tell Surprise - Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S01)
programme.desc: Blaze of Glory - Blaze and his driver AJ are introduced to a world of racing Monster Machines. But when a truck named Crusher uses dirty tricks to try and win the Championship Race, Blaze will do everything to help his friends and beat Crusher to the finish line.

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S06)
programme.desc: Pups Rescue a Rescuer / Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - Mayor Goodway tries to help the Paw Patrol rescue Danny, but the pups end up having to rescue the rescuer, too! // A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington And The Chinese New Year / Paddington And The Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S02)
programme.desc: Dino Dash - Blaze and AJ are playing with their friend Zeg when he accidentally gets blasted by a geyser into a far away mud pit. It’s up to Blaze and AJ to save him, using engineering design inspired by their new dinosaur-truck friends.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S02)
programme.desc: Piggy 500 - Starla is excited to race with her prize pig Zippy in the Piggy 500! But when her competitor Crusher and his rude pig Slop cheat and send Zippy far away, it’s up to Blaze, AJ, and Starla to get Zippy back to the race in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo - After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Butterbean's Café (S02)

Will he be able to make his important delivery in time?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S04)
programme.desc: The Summer Camp Games! - Summer is here! Molly, Gil, and the rest of the Guppies celebrate the season with lots of outdoor fun. Gil uses his summer camping skills to rescue Bubble Puppy during the Summer Camp Games!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S02)
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: Barbabravo is not feeling well / Be patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S03)
programme.desc: Falcon Quest - In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S04)

programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Mount Everest, Asia - Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15)
programme.desc: Stop That Bus! - Bertie the Bus is waiting to pick up Dowager Hatt and her friends, but Thomas takes him on a tour instead. Unfortunately, Bertie ends up becoming stranded on the Shake Shake Bridge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S1)
programme.desc: Sit Shop - When Duck's chair breaks, a bus trip to a very special shop is in order.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S1)
programme.desc: Rainbow Lemon - Sarah and Duck make a colourful new friend during breakfast.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1)
programme.desc: Stand Up Comedy - Nelly and Nora try to make the cows stand up, so Dad won't think it's going to rain.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2)
programme.desc: I Will Be Especially, Very Careful - Lola is overjoyed when Lotta finally agrees to do swaps. Lola can borrow Lotta's brand new fluffy white coat in exchange for Lola's clippy handbag.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1)
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Wondermost - The Dinopaws want to do something special at the beach, but making a decision becomes hard!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1)
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Ours - The Dinopaws build a treehouse but find they can't agree on how to decorate it.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3)
programme.desc: Mango - Dee encourages a friend to say 'mango' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of mangoes - a sweet mango, a juicy mango, a silly mango and even a mango doing a tango!

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1)
programme.desc: Melting and Freezing - Pup is at the beach and Kit is in the snow. Can you see who has the melting ice cream and who has the frozen lolly? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator discover which food will melt and which will stay the same.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Grandmaster Glitch wants to watch his favourite DVD in peace, so uses his remote control to pause the Rio Carnival in Brazil!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: The Aqueduct of Segovia - Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: The Numtums (S2)
programme.desc: The Hunt For The Golden Treat - Gladdy sets the Numpups a challenge: to outwit her security measures and crack the code to retrieve the Golden Treat.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1)
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Clangers (S3)
programme.desc: Toots - When Tiny is out fishing in the music boat, she catches four strange metal objects. She takes them home to show Small, but when Small arrives and looks in the music boat with Tiny, the things have gone!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15)
programme.desc: Stuck On You - Thomas meets Butch, who has a magnet attached to his crane arm, which impresses Thomas greatly.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1)
programme.desc: It's time for a special visitor - It is a cold Winter afternoon, the trees are bare and the air is frosty. JoJo and Gran Gran wait for Mummy and Daddy to bring back a special visitor from the airport - Great Gran Gran!

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.desc: The Aqueduct of Segovia - Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: The Numtums (S2)
programme.desc: The Hunt For The Golden Treat - Gladdy sets the Numpups a challenge: to outwit her security measures and crack the code to retrieve the Golden Treat.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1)
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Clangers (S3)
programme.desc: Toots - When Tiny is out fishing in the music boat, she catches four strange metal objects. She takes them home to show Small, but when Small arrives and looks in the music boat with Tiny, the things have gone!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15)
programme.desc: Stuck On You - Thomas meets Butch, who has a magnet attached to his crane arm, which impresses Thomas greatly.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1)
programme.desc: It's time for a special visitor - It is a cold Winter afternoon, the trees are bare and the air is frosty. JoJo and Gran Gran wait for Mummy and Daddy to bring back a special visitor from the airport - Great Gran Gran!

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family, earning their Family Photo Badges and a brilliant group picture in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Easter Island, Chile - Grandmaster Glitch is on holiday to the remote Easter Island to avoid crowds, but when he arrives he finds droves of tourists everywhere!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: The Grand Canyon, USA - Kyan is completing his 'GoJet Academy' high-wire training, above the Grand Canyon, but he's not the only wire-walker out there...

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1)
programme.desc: Dog Loves Monsters - Dog and Pug visit a spooky castle, where they meet a princess who has no friends. Fortunately, they find a baby dragon who becomes best of friends with the princess.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1)
programme.desc: Dog Loves Snark - Dog and Pug meet a pirate captain on a desert island who is hunting the Snark. Our friends realise that they should protect the Snark and develop a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1)
programme.desc: Andy and The Ring Tailed Lemurs - When Andy accidentally breaks a plaster cast of a ring tailed lemur's footprint that Mr Hammond made, it's up to Andy to put things right.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4)
programme.desc: Sinker's Return - Cook and Line declare it's time to party! Gem soon puts a stop to Cook and Line's party dancing saying they need a captain to send down a jewel when the Swashbucklers win a game.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S1)
programme.desc: Naima's Algerian Borek - Naima is cooking a special Algerian Borek. Borek is made from pastry, mashed potato, meat, cheese and you can even add olives. She can't wait for her friends to taste it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Loch Ness, Scotland - The Go Jetters head to Scotland in search of the Loch Ness Monster, but Grandmaster Glitch plans to catch Nessie first, if only his Grimbler was up to the job.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1)
programme.desc: Mount Everest, Asia - Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15)
programme.desc: Stop That Bus! - Bertie the Bus is waiting to pick up Dowager Hatt and her friends, but Thomas takes him on a tour instead. Unfortunately, Bertie ends up becoming stranded on the Shake Shake Bridge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S1)
programme.desc: Sit Shop - When Duck's chair breaks, a bus trip to a very special shop is in order.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S1)
programme.desc: Rainbow Lemon - Sarah and Duck make a colourful new friend during breakfast.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1)
programme.desc: Stand Up Comedy - Nelly and Nora try to make the cows stand up, so Dad won't think it's going to rain.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2)
programme.desc: I Will Be Especially, Very Careful - Lola is overjoyed when Lotta finally agrees to do swaps. Lola can borrow Lotta's brand new fluffy white coat in exchange for Lola's clippy handbag.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1)
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Wondermost - The Dinopaws want to do something special at the beach, but making a decision becomes hard!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1)
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Ours - The Dinopaws build a treehouse but find they can't agree on how to decorate it.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3)
programme.desc: Mango - Dee encourages a friend to say 'mango' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of mangoes - a sweet mango, a juicy mango, a silly mango and even a mango doing a tango!

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1)
programme.desc: Melting and Freezing - Pup is at the beach and Kit is in the snow. Can you see who has the melting ice cream and who has the frozen lolly? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator discover which food will melt and which will stay the same.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3)
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: The Flame Across Japan
programme.desc: Heading to the Tokyo Olympic and Paralympic Games, the torch makes its way across the country from March to August. This time, we highlight the flame's third day in Kanagawa Prefecture.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan Tohoku
programme.desc: The devasting disaster in Tohoku, northeast Japan, on March 11, 2011. Fukushima-born Daisuke Shimizu, time-lapse creator focuses on the hard-hit Tohoku region, 9 years on.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Lunch ON!
programme.desc: We visit a mother in Shizuoka, who has been making her daughter bento lunch every day. Her daughter got married and will be moving out. We report on the very last day she makes bento for her daughter.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Edo's Rush Hour
programme.desc: Edo was a city of waterways. The Yoroi Ferry transported people across the Nihonbashi River, one of its main commercial arteries. For the captain, it was a high-pressure job requiring skill and guts.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
